campaigns.title: Coronavirus Covid19 2Seattle Residents Need Help
campaigns.description: My wife and I live in king county Washington which as you may know is the epicenter of the coronavirus covid19 in the United States everyday is a struggle and every single day it's only seeming to get more and more difficult for us and this virus going around is a big part of the problem yet there's something else my wife and I have been dealing with since before this whole epidemic even started. 2 words kidney cancer. My wife has the absolute strongest will to live and 2 overcome extraordinarily difficult circumstances more so than anyone I've ever seen. Everyday she manages to keep going regardless of the pain she feels every second of every day. I promise you the extent of which is astronomical to such a point even when shes able to sleep she tell me there's no relief from the pain she feels. We don't have the money to hire someone to help her out with doing things so I care for her the best I possibly can because I love her more than anything and anyone else I have before yet i fear its not enough especially since being there for her all the time makes it near impossible to keep a steady job. Honestly though I'm starting to feel a bit defeated and extremely overwhelmed since the beginning of our relationship I was aware because of her epilepsy there would be challenges not every normal couple faces that's perfectly fine with me. Then when we found out about the cancer it felt like being sucker punched by Mike Tyson right in the gut. After which we've had ups and downs yet as of lately there's been far more downs. Still we try to maintain some sort of positivity for the chance of a better tomorrow. With everything happening with and around us especially after finding out where we are living is the coronavirus covid 19s epicenter of the whole United States and people with pre underlining health conditions are far more susceptible and likely to die if they get infected aka my wife they say for people who get infected that already have renal conditions the virus can make some people's kidney simply stop working and fail all together so on top of all we're facing there's also now that to worry us and fact in the back of our minds none stop.... Bottom line we need help I honestly don't know what else to attempt to do but ask for help so anybody please help us anyway you can anything helps. We would be extremely thankful for whatever kindness support anybody can help us with.

campaigns.title: Help For 84yo Icecream Man MR Corona
campaigns.description: Eleuterio is a 84 year old man that sells icecream and churros on the streets of South Chicago, his knees are giving up on him due to his age and his wife is battling beast cancer at the hospital, he has to take care of here and buy her medicine because they have no government aid due to their legal status in the USA. He has been pushing his little cart around for almost 20 Yeats sellING ice cream on the summer and churros/corn in the super cold Chicago winter under the snow. This is a very hardworking, who has never asked for anything on his life. I believe it is time now to help him, thinking of him as if he was our grandpa or father, he really is in need of this help, please touch your heart and donate one dollar makes a big difference! Let's help him reach his goal so he can rest at least this winter and take care of his ill wife!!! PLEASE SHARE SHARE SHARE. DIOS los bendiga!

campaigns.title: Lyft and Uber Drivers COVID-19 Relief Funds
campaigns.description: As everyone knows that many places and events are closed/cancelled/postponed or closing because of the Coronavirus (COVID-19). Because of these actions, lyft and uber drivers get hit hard because there are no riders to pickup. The luxury drivers like myself even hit harder because of the stop in traveling. As you may or may not know, lyft and uber drivers are independent contractors and may not qualify for government stimulus or unemployment benefits. Many, many drivers do this job full time, which include leasing or financing used and new vehicles.¬¨‚Ä† These drivers rely on weekly pay from driving to pay for vehicle, gas, insurance, maintenance, and their own personal bills and livelihood.¬¨‚Ä†  ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä†Many of these drivers do not do it because they will get rich, but because they love to be independent, love to drive, and interact with the public. I am a driver, so I know what is happening in real-time. In the past week, Second week in March 2020) I have been on the street with my app on for 34 hrs during the week mentioned above and only got Eight (8) rides with a total of $118.24. That amount is just for gas. Not only the rides are down, but the chance of catching the virus as well.   If you ever take lyft and or uber or have an understanding how the gig economy works or so on, please make a donation.  It is hard for hail-ride drivers to just stay home and don't know where they¬¨‚Ä† are going to get their next dollar. This is real! This fund will help drivers to at least pay few important bills. This virus is a calamity that hits many sectors across the world.¬¨‚Ä†  Whatever amount you can donate, please do so. Around 80% of the State of Massachusetts shuts down for at least Three (3) weeks, with no concrete end in sight. These are crucial and trying times for everyone.  This donation will make a different to vulnerable drivers that rely on that weekly funds.  On behalf of Massachusetts lyft and uber drivers, we need your help and thank you in advance.

campaigns.title: Io non resto a guardare, STOP COVID-19
campaigns.description: C'‚àö¬Æ bisogno di qualcosa di pi‚àöœÄ forte, un' imponente¬¨‚Ä†messaggio ¬¨‚Ä†a tutte le persone che stanno lottando contro il nuovo coronavirus, un  gesto solidale ¬¨‚Ä†verso i malati e tutti i medici che stanno combattendo giorno e notte questa guerra. Stiamo vivendo un momento drammatico, dove ogni giorno i numeri ci raccontano una situazione che continua a peggiorare.¬¨‚Ä†In questo delicato contesto di emergenza nazionale, vogliamo lanciare un grido di speranza con un caloroso appello dalla nostra piccola Regione... dalle Marche, l'Italia chiam‚àö‚â§!  Non rimaniamo a casa a guardare la tv, ma rimaniamo a casa a dare una mano. ¬¨‚Ä†  Un piccolo gesto, per un grande obiettivo!   Con i  fondi raccolti  saremo in grado di: ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ rinforzare i  10¬¨‚Ä†reparti di terapia intensiva  degli ospedali marchigiani ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ attivare  10¬¨‚Ä†ventilatori  per la Protezione Civile ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ fornire  100.000  ¬¨‚Ä†mascherine certificate ¬¨‚Ä† ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ distribuire il  nuovo test rapido Covid-19  ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ assistere gli  anziani  con la consegna di pasti e medicine a domicilio   100.000 euro, per 1.5 milioni di vite!    *******************************************  Let's transform the slogan  #Istayathome  into something stronger, a  massive message  to all the people who are fighting the new coronavirus, a  gesture of solidarity  towards the sick and all the doctors who are fighting this war day and night.  So, the slogan becomes  #dontstandbyandwatch .  We are experiencing a dramatic situation, where every day the numbers tell us about a situation that continues to get worse. In this delicate moment of national emergency, we want to launch a cry of hope with a warm appeal from our small  Marche Region .  We don't stay at home to watch TV, but we stay at home to help out.   A small gesture, for a big goal!   With the  funds raised  we will be able to: ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ reinforce the ¬¨‚Ä†10 intensive care units  of the Marche hospital ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ activate  10 respiratory ventilator  to the Civil Protection ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ supply  millions of certified masks  ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ distribute the  new Covid-19 rapid test  ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ assist the  elderly  with the delivery of meals and medicines at home   100.000 euros, for 1.5 million lives!    ***************************************  Transformamos el eslogan  #mequedoencasa ¬¨‚Ä†en algo m‚àö¬∞s fuerte, un  mensaje imponente  para todas las personas que luchan contra el nuevo coronavirus, un  gesto de solidaridad  hacia los enfermos y todos los m‚àö¬©dicos que luchan esta guerra d‚àö‚â†a y noche.  Entonces el eslogan se convierte en  #notequedesmirando .  Estamos experimentando una situaci‚àö‚â•n dram‚àö¬∞tica, donde cada d‚àö‚â†a los n‚àö‚à´meros nos informan sobre una situaci‚àö‚â•n que contin‚àö‚à´a empeorando. En este delicado momento de emergencia nacional, queremos lanzar un grito de esperanza con un c‚àö¬∞lido llamamiento de nuestra peque‚àö¬±a  Regi‚àö‚â•n Marche .  No nos quedamos en casa para ver televisi‚àö‚â•n, pero nos quedamos en casa para ayudar.   Un peque‚àö¬±o gesto, para un gran gol!   Con los fondos recaudados podremos: ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ reforzar las  10 unidades de cuidados intensivos hospitalarios de Marche ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ activar 10 fan‚àö¬∞ticos de la Protecci‚àö‚â•n Civil  ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ suministrar  100.000 m‚àö¬∞scaras¬¨‚Ä†certificadas  ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ distribuir la  nueva prueba r‚àö¬∞pida Covid-19  ‚Äö√Ñ¬¢ ayudar a los  ancianos  con la entrega de comidas y medicinas en el hogar   ¬¨¬∞100.000 euros, por 1,5 millones de vidas!

campaigns.title: COVID-19 Affecting Pay for Nail Salon Employees
campaigns.description: By Allegheny County Health Department‚Äö√Ñ√¥s recommendation, non-essential businesses are closing for 14 days to avoid the spread of COVID-19. This includes small businesses that are not able to provide paid leave for their employees. Compliance to this recommendation is highly encouraged, but it doesn‚Äö√Ñ√¥t protect the employees‚Äö√Ñ√¥ pay or provide any sort of financial relief. This leaves small business owners stuck in a very tough place.  Obsidian Nail Studio in the South Hills of Pittsburgh is owned by my sister, Stephanie Campbell. She and her three nail artists provide incredible services to their clients. Unfortunately, Obsidian Nail Studio will have to close from March 17th until March 31st, following the closure recommendation. This means that she and her nail artists won‚Äö√Ñ√¥t be making any money for two entire weeks. Steph has a young daughter who will be turning nine years old during this two week closure. She and her stylists each have bills, rent, and mortgage payments. COVID-19 can close businesses, but it can‚Äö√Ñ√¥t stop the bills from coming.  I‚Äö√Ñ√¥d like to support my sister and her employees during this difficult time by raising money for them to cover their time of unemployment. All four of them together in two weeks make $12,000. Please add your support to help these beautiful ladies despite the unfortunate temporary closure of their salon and income. Thank you so much for sharing and donating!! Let‚Äö√Ñ√¥s make these ladies smile today!

campaigns.title: A Youth Theater Program Postponed due to COVID-19
campaigns.description: Want ¬¨‚Ä† to help support youth in theater who have been told they may not be able to have a performance after months of hard work and dedication?¬¨‚Ä†   I‚Äö√Ñ√¥m raising money to donate to Coastal Academy‚Äö√Ñ√¥s musical theater program. Their director and choreographer have impacted each and every cast member. The 4th-8th graders cast in this years production of Willy Wonka are fantastic, and have worked incredibly hard this year. Unfortunately, due to the rapidly evolving COVID-19 situation, their production has been postponed. These devastated kids no longer have a theater to perform in, and they aren‚Äö√Ñ√¥t sure if they are going to be able to ever have the production they have been working towards all year.¬¨‚Ä†  Coastal Academy is a part of The Classical Academies organization; an organization of successful California public charter schools that maintain a commitment to excellence through their partnership with parents. Coastal Academy provides personal attention and opportunities for each student to maximize his or her potential by creating a learning environment that prepares students for a lifetime of learning and exploring. To visit their website, click  here.   ¬¨‚Ä†   Thank you ¬¨‚Ä†in advance for your contribution to this cause that means so much to all of these talented cast members, their wonderful choreographer, and their incredible director.

campaigns.title: COVID19 un posto letto per gli ospedali siciliani
campaigns.description: L'Italia ‚àö¬Æ colpita dall'epidemia COVID-19. Il contagio ‚àö¬Æ veloce, fulminante, e le vittime crescono di ora in ora. Non sono speciale, ma oggi vorrei provare a fare qualcosa di speciale. Non posso da sola, ho bisogno di te.¬¨‚Ä† Dona qualcosa per donare una posto in pi‚àöœÄ, un respiratore in pi‚àöœÄ, un letto in pi‚àöœÄ agli ospedali.¬¨‚Ä† Dona perch‚àö¬© quel letto potrebbe essere tuo, di tuo padre, tua madre, tuo fratello. Anche se non vivi qui, anche se mai ci sei stato e forse mai ci verrai,¬¨‚Ä†quel posto letto potrebbe fare la differenza¬¨‚Ä†per qualcuno che sente le tue stesse paure, ora che mi stai leggendo.¬¨‚Ä†  Aiutami a fare la differenza. Dona quello che puoi o vuoi e condividi fra tutti i tuoi contatti.   *********** ¬¨‚Ä†  Italy has been severely hit by COVID19 and locked down. Infection is rapid, ruthless, and victims are growing. I am not special, but today I'm trying to do something special. I can't do this on my own, I need you. Donate for one more intensive care bed,¬¨‚Ä† one more monitor, one more ventilation device.¬¨‚Ä† Donate because¬¨‚Ä†THAT¬¨‚Ä†bed could be your father's, mother's brother's.¬¨‚Ä† Even if you don't live here, even if you have never been here and perhaps you'll never see Messina,¬¨‚Ä†that intensive care bed could make a difference¬¨‚Ä†for someone who is experiencing the same fear you feel right now, for you and for your dear ones.¬¨‚Ä†  Please help make a difference. Donate and share with all your contacts.

campaigns.title: Relief for families and students amid COVID19
campaigns.description: I am working to help fundraise money for the families of my students who are financially affected by the COVID19 pandemic. I am a 3rd grade teacher in a Title One school in SFUSD. During this time of uncertainty and financial strain many of my students' families are struggling financially as their jobs have been suspended, schools have been cancelled, and rent and other necessities are placing strain on them. I feel it is my duty to try to assist these families in their time of need. I believe this distribution of funds will most likely look different depending on the amount of money earned in GoFundMe;¬¨‚Ä†   Tier 1 ($2000) : With your gracious donation I will assist all families with Safeway gift cards to make sure that families are able to stay healthy and well. We are working as a school to provide 13 students' families with a $150 gift card for each family. This will be based off of the highest need at the school at this time.¬¨‚Ä†   Tier 2 ($4000) : I would be able to reach out to other teachers in my community to distribute more gift cards to the greater population. We are currently compiling information about families financial and sustainable needs at this time and will be able to support families with food, household essentials, and internet access during remote school learning.   Tier 3 ($6000+) :¬¨‚Ä† With more money we will be able to reach more families within the communities! I will work with other teachers and my principal to bring financial support to families most in crisis at this moment. We are currently working on figuring out if we can get electronic devices for students who do not currently have one in their home. With your generous donation we will be able to supply some families with electronic devices so they will be able to keep up with their studies and education at home. Bringing electronic devices to students will also help to combat boredom many students face at this time of uncertainty.¬¨‚Ä†  I have already done some fundraising and have been able to give some gift cards to families and they have told me how much of a difference they have made in their lives. Most of my students live in single guardianship households who sometimes work up to three jobs to try to make ends meet. Some of my students live in transitional housing, newly provided by the state. With the imminent news of further closures and school shut downs the fear and worry have set in that there is a possibility that families will no longer be able to make rent among other things. The students at my school who participate in the free lunch program usually don't eat lunch because they don't like the selections provided by the district. Even though there is free food distributed by the district, I know that my families are not taking advantage of it because of the selections being minimal. With your help, I will work to directly support families in most need at this time. While in this time of need, gathering around the table for a home cooked meal and spending time with family without the worry of where your next meal will come from will make all the difference. Please consider helping the community and giving directly to families in most need at this time. Thank you for reading!

campaigns.title: CORONA RELIEF FOR ALOHA NAILS STAFF
campaigns.description: When we first opened  Aloha Nails  in 2018 @ Rea Farms, we were super excited at the opportunity to serve our beloved Mecklenburg county. As a start of any business, it was a struggle at first but with hard work, perseverance   passion, our business began to blossom and our Aloha Family grew. Everyday that we woke up to open  Aloha Nails Rea Farms , we were overflowed with gratitude, especially with the constant support of our beloved clients. For our dream is finally happening: a wonderful work place filled with dedicated staff and wonderful clients.  This dream came to a halt the past couple of weeks when COVID-19 began to make its sinister way into the US, then NC, then our beloved Mecklenburg county. We saw the increasing fear and anxiety in our staff‚Äö√Ñ√¥s faces as people began to social distant and we could almost hear their thoughts: ‚Äö√Ñ√∫Am I going to be lay-off?‚Äö√Ñ√π and ‚Äö√Ñ√∫How am I going to pay my bills!‚Äö√Ñ√π Then it happened. Local, state   federal guideline of  ‚Äö√Ñ√∫social distancing‚Äö√Ñ√π  was officially issued to flatten the curve. With a heavy heart, we made a painful decision to  temporarily close  on Wednesday the 18th - March 31st (or even possibly longer!) to do our part for the sake of our staff and client's health. We pray that if everyone social distant NOW, we can all go back to our normal life SOON. As any business owner out there right now, we are terrified with income loss while still having countless overhead fees and rent to pay. However, even more devastating is our dear staff who are now without jobs and thus without income (esp tips) to support their family.  And so here is our plea: Please donate however much you can to help our Aloha staff.  100% of donation will go to them, after campaign fees.  For us, to see that they have clients and friends out there who care enough to donate   help them out during this crisis, is already a reward in itself.¬¨‚Ä† We can't wait for life to be back to normal again and to again serve our beloved Mecklenburg county.    Thank you  for your support always   Aloha!  much love,   Lesley   Codie  Instagram/facebook @ alohanailsreafarms www.alohanailsreafarms.com

campaigns.title: Covid-19 face shield for nurses and Doctors.
campaigns.description: Hello everyone my name is Hector. I am the founder of Kor Kreations 3D printing home business. I am putting my sales on my etsy store on hold in order to do my part and provide these face shields to my local hospital staff who are testing and treating coronavirus patients at no cost to them. I am trying to raise money to help pay for the cost of 3D printing these Prusa face shields. I also have to buy the clear plastic petg that acts as a shield. I am a disable Marine Corps. veteran and on limited income.¬¨‚Ä† Your donations will help buy the material used to print the face shields. The clear plastic shields.Elmer's glue sticks along with replacement parts for the printer when they break down. Replacement glass surfaces. Pay for electric bill and post processing tools. Cleaning and disinfecting products to clean all the face shields donated to medical staff at my local hospitals. Also gas and parking cost to travel back and forth from home to these hospitals.¬¨‚Ä† I thank you all for your time to check out this fundraiser and donations.¬¨‚Ä† We are in this together. I have the tools to make a difference just not the cash flow to make it happened. But with your help we can help medical staff who are fighting this virus head on without medical supplies stay save and healthy.

campaigns.title: Wegen Corona gefeuert
campaigns.description: Hallo da drau‚àö√ºen,  Mein Name ist Simone. ich bin erfolgreiche Studentin der Religionswissenschaft und stehe kurz vor meinem Abschluss. Ich habe zwei wundersch‚àö‚àÇne Katzen, von denen eine 10 und eine 6 Jahre alt ist und von denen ich mich niemals trennen k‚àö‚àÇnnte. Eher w‚àö¬∫rde ich auf mein Essen verzichten als dass es ihnen an etwas fehlen sollte. Ich bin Afghanistan-Veteranin und habe bis gestern mein Leben mehr oder weniger aus eigener Kraft bestreiten k‚àö‚àÇnnen, seit ich 17 Jahre alt bin.    Heute habe ich meine K‚àö¬∫ndigung erhalten. In unserer Firma wurden ‚àö¬∫ber 100 Mitarbeiter, die sich noch in der Probezeit befanden, spontan entlassen, obwohl man uns noch letzte Woche beschwichtigt hat, dass niemand sich Sorgen machen muss. Nun bin ich ab April arbeitslos.     Das Problem ist: ich bin im letzten Mastersemester und kann nur Arbeitslosengeld beantragen, wenn ich mich exmatrikuliere; kurz vor meiner Abschlusspr‚àö¬∫fung. Mein Lebenstraum, der Masterabschluss, w‚àö¬ßre dann beendet.  Ich bin Arbeiterkind, war 14 Jahre bei der Bundeswehr und habe immer hart darum gek‚àö¬ßmpft endlich studieren zu d‚àö¬∫rfen, und bis vor Kurzem habe ich es aus eigenen Mitteln bestreiten k‚àö‚àÇnnen, manchmal auch mit etwas Hilfe von Freunden. Dann wurde ich durch meinen vorherigen Job krank durch Mobbing, habe im Oktober nach langer Krankheit endlich die Kraft gehabt zu wechseln, und wurde jetzt zusammen mit allen meinen Kollegen, die wie ich noch in der Probezeit waren gefeuert. Es waren nur noch zwei Wochen Probezeit... aber das war egal. Laut meiner Teamleiterin werden wir wegen einer Corona-bedingten Flaute entlassen. Jetzt habe ich also nicht nur kein Gehalt, sondern auch bald keine Krankenversicherung mehr, da ich mich f‚àö¬∫r 190 Euro im Monat aus eigener Tasche freiwillig versichern m‚àö¬∫sste. Als w‚àö¬ßre das nicht schon anstrengend genug, bin ich gerade in einer tagesklinischen Behandlung, oder w‚àö¬ßre es, aber auch meine Klinik (LWL Bochum) wurde zwangsevakuiert wegen einer einzigen Corona-Infektion in einem anderen Geb‚àö¬ßude.    Ich bin jetzt 43 Jahre alt und habe erst durch meine bewegte Lebensgeschichte mit 38 anfangen k‚àö‚àÇnnen zu studieren. In meinem Alter bin ich nicht BAF‚àö√±G-berechtigt. Dass ich mein Studium bisher in einem angemessenen Zeitrahmen durchgezogen habe, ist dabei leider unwichtig. Ich sollte jetzt vom 3. ins 4. Mastersemester wechseln und dann meinen Abschluss machen. Ich habe zwar einen Studienkredit (auch die sind in meinem Alter sehr schwer zu finden), aber der deckt gerade so einmal die Kaltmiete ab. Aufgrund meiner derzeitigen Erkrankung ist auch eine Wiederaufnahme in die Tagesklinik geplant, also w‚àö¬ßre eine Bewerbung zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt unsinnig, ich m‚àö¬∫sste ja vermutlich in den n‚àö¬ßchsten Wochen eh wieder zur‚àö¬∫ck ins Krankenhaus. Aber ob ich bis dahin noch versichert bin, ist fraglich. Oder ich muss meinen Lebenstraum auf der Zielgeraden begraben.    Die Lage ist ziemlich schlimm, ich bekomme in zwei Wochen mein letztes Gehalt und dann stehe ich buchst‚àö¬ßblich vor dem Nichts, da f‚àö¬∫r jemanden in meiner Lebenssituation einfach niemand zust‚àö¬ßndig ist, kein Amt, keine Beh‚àö‚àÇrde, kein Notfallplan. Alles, was ich brauche, ist etwas Hilfe, um die n‚àö¬ßchsten zwei Monate zu ‚àö¬∫berstehen.  Kann mir jemand da drau‚àö√ºen helfen?

campaigns.title: International Student Relief at OU (COVID-19)
campaigns.description: The COVID-19 Crisis is affecting the entire world right now, which means that there are multiple communities from all over the world who are at risk of different problems. Here at the University of Oklahoma, international students are a particularly vulnerable community.   Many students rely on employment and its income for their needs, paying their tuition or affording healthcare. Those students currently have reduced work hours and cannot afford basic necessities, and in many cases, may have to spend more money for unanticipated summer housing or travel costs.  There are 2,155 international students at OU from 135 different countries, all with different border restrictions caused by COVID-19. Based on initial survey data, we have found that multiple students are in dire need of money for everything from medication to housing to groceries.  Thus, we are starting with a 5,000 USD goal. It might seem like a lot, but a lot of students are facing immediate situations and troubles with wide ranges.¬¨‚Ä†  We urgently ask for your help. This campaign will remain open to receive donations, so please continue donating and sharing to the best of your ability! Everything will go to help international students!    The International Advisory Committee (IAC) is an international student organization (ISO) that serves as the umbrella for all other ISOs. We are student run and are advised by the College of International Studies. We advocate for international students on campus and the international community as a whole. We also bring different events to OU, including International Bazaar, International Prom, Human Library, International Pageant and the sadly cancelled Eve of Nations due to COVID-19 fears .

campaigns.description: Coronavirus, let's help intensive care! -    In this really difficult phase for our country we can also do something to support our communities. Doctors and scientists are doing a very important job and we would like to help support them.  For this reason, we thought of helping the intensive care unit at the HM Hospital Universitario Madrid in Madrid. At this moment the equipment necessary to triple the intensive and subintensive care beds are: - Fans - Non invasive ventilation devices - Hemodynamic monitoring - Monitor  Even a small donation can make a difference.  We are in close contact with the doctors of the HM Hospital Universitario Madrid hospital in Madrid. The funds raised will be directly donated to the hospital to strengthen intensive care.   * * *   En este delicado momento en el que nos encontramos, desde un punto de vista social y de salud, nosotros tambi‚àö¬©n podemos hacer algo. Los m‚àö¬©dicos y cient‚àö‚â†ficos est‚àö¬∞n haciendo un trabajo muy importante y nos gustar‚àö‚â†a apoyarlos de manera concreta.  Por esta raz‚àö‚â•n, hemos lanzado este crowdfunding cuyos fondos ir‚àö¬∞n destinados a la activaci‚àö‚â•n de una nueva terapia intensiva en el HM Hospital Universitario Madrid de Madrid.¬¨‚Ä†  En este momento, los equipos necesarios para triplicar las camas de cuidados intensivos y semiintensivos son: - Equipos de ventilaci‚àö‚â•n - Dispositivos de ventilaci‚àö‚â•n no invasivos. - Monitoreo hemodin‚àö¬∞mico - Monitor  Incluso una peque‚àö¬±a donaci‚àö‚â•n puede marcar la diferencia.  Estamos en estrecho contacto con los m‚àö¬©dicos del hospital HM Hospital Universitario Madrid. Los fondos recaudados ser‚àö¬∞n donados directamente al hospital para ayudar a la unidad de cuidados intensivos.  * * *  In questa fase davvero delicata, dal punto di vista sociale e sanitario, possiamo anche noi fare qualcosa. Medici e scienziati stanno facendo un lavoro importantissimo e vorremmo supportarli concretamente.  Per questo motivo abbiamo pensato di aiutare l‚Äö√Ñ√¥attivazione di una nuova terapia intensiva presso l‚Äö√Ñ√¥Ospedale HM Universitario di Madrid. In questo momento le attrezzature necessarie per triplicare i posti letto di terapia intensiva e subintensiva sono:¬¨‚Ä† - Ventilatori - Dispositivi di ventilazione non invasiva - Monitoraggio emodinamico - Monitor¬¨‚Ä†  Anche una piccola donazione pu‚àö‚â§ fare la differenza.  Siamo in stretto contatto con i medici dell'ospedale HM Universitario di Madrid. I fondi raccolti saranno direttamente devoluti all‚Äö√Ñ√¥ospedale per il rafforzamento della terapia intensiva.

campaigns.title: Corona Relief San Diego
campaigns.description: What started as a handful of people posting on our local next door app to offer help to those in need, has turned into more than 150 volunteers ready and willing to receive orders, purchase goods, and deliver supplies to our elderly, immune comprised and quarentined neighbors.¬¨‚Ä†  Where you come in:¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†we are quickly finding that some of our neighbors are already facing the financial hardship of the coronavirus quarentine effects and we hate to think of our community going without because of financial burdens.¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†Are volunteers are willing to share their own supplies, purchase goods with their own money, but we know eventually the need will ourweigh our own reseouces.¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†During these times of uncertainty, a feeling of helpless is common, and many are seeking ways to be of use and support others.¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†Social distancing does not mean we cannot take care of our neighbors and our financial support can change and save lives for many.¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†  Our goal is to raise enough money to purchase and donate supplies ¬¨‚Ä†for 100 people in need, at $30-$40 a care package. The care package would include groceries and toilet paper for those in need who cannot afford their necessities nor go outside of their homes. We are working with local markets to secure necessary provisions to dispatch to our team of over 150 generous volunteers who are ready to delivery goods and hope.¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†We will have a team managing the resources, auditing purchases with receipts, and making sure your financial support goes to those who need it most.  Thank you for supporting the elderly, sick, immunocompromised and those in need!¬¨‚Ä†  ¬¨‚Ä†   ""When ""I"" is replaced with ""We"", even illness becomes WELLNESS."" Stay well!¬¨‚Ä†

campaigns.title: Aid for Wuhan Against Novel Coronavirus
campaigns.description: Wuhan, located in Hubei province, was hit with a devastating virus at the beginning of January. Since then, the numbers of those infected and died have grown exponentially, killing over 600 people with another 30,000 infected. The effects of the novel coronavirus are very evident throughout China seen with roads being blocked, major cities being quarantined, and hospitals being inundated with thousands of cases. This surplus of patients has led to an extreme shortage of supplies that are necessary for the doctors to treat the sick, including face masks, medical goggles, and hazmat suits. As this virus is relatively new, not much is known about it yet making it unpredictable and threatening.  This is why we need your help. There are over 98 million people living in the epicenter of this outbreak with no way out, making it an extremely dangerous situation for them. Even a donation of $5 is sufficient to provide aid to those on the frontlines battling the coronavirus. I have partnered with the ACP Foundation and the North Texas Hubei Association who will be able to ensure supplies can be shipped to the Hubei province as soon as possible. All proceeds will be donated towards North Texas Hubei Association who has sellers to purchase the supplies from (face masks, gloves, sanitation suits, etc.) to distribute to various hospitals in the Hubei province. This association has already delivered 10,000 medical gowns, 35,000 face masks, and 1,875 protective goggles to Hubei Province. The situation in China is worsening and they need all the aid they can receive. Please support us as we join ranks with the citizens of Wuhan and fight against the Novel Coronavirus. If you have any questions, feel free to send me an email ( gianna6818@gmail.com  or Angela Huang at  angela.huang13@gmail.com ).√ä‚â†¬∂√ä¬±√¢√Ç√§‚Ä†√ä‚â§œÄ!

campaigns.title: safety equipment for doctors treating coronavirus
campaigns.description: Doctors and nurses in China who have been treating patients infected by Coronavirus are in dire need of safety equipment such as laboratory gowns, protective eyewear, and N-95 masks to protect themselves against the virus. There has been a large shortage of this equipment in China and many medical personnel have been working without it. We have been in contact with hospital directors in Beijing who are asking for this protective equipment to be received as soon as possible. The virus is shared though the eyes so we are aiming to send a shipment of protective eyewear and N-95masks to Beijing during the first week of February.¬¨‚Ä†  Members of my family who were doctors during the SARS epidemic in 2003 almost perished working to save the lives of Chinese citizens and it would mean a lot if we could help safeguard our doctors and nurses who are risking their lives every day.my family will be matching donations up to $1000  Even if you are unable to donate, please share this link and help us reach our goal within the next week as this is a very urgent situation!

campaigns.title: Feed The Elderly Affected By Covid-19 #feedtheneed
campaigns.description: Hi, my name is Alex Hult and I am the Founder   CEO of Flights Restaurant Group with four locations here in Silicon Valley and one in Las Vegas, NV. Together, with a group of restaurateurs, we have created a fundraiser that will feed the elderly most impacted by Covid-19. Please show your support by making a donation here to help #FeedTheNeed in our community. We are working with local support groups to distribute these meals.   Our meals will feed a family of 4-6 people. As of right now there are three meals available with more to come as more restaurants join our efforts.  The Family Meal options we are offering are:  -Swedish Meatballs with mashed potatoes served with lingon berries and gravy  -Grilled Salmon with mashed potatoes served with dill and lemon sauce  -Chicken Parmesan served with marinara fettuccine  *All meals are served with a family salad and mac   cheese.  These ready-to-serve family meals will also be available for curbside pick-up at our Flights Restaurant location in Los Gatos for $55 + tax.¬¨‚Ä† Order a meal today for your family by calling (408)354-3434. We will continue to serve the community through DoorDash under Flights Restaurant as well.  Thank you for helping us #FeedTheNeed.

campaigns.title: Ayuda al Hospital de Getafe contra el COVID-19
campaigns.description: El mundo entero vive momentos complicados a consecuencia del COVID-19 y, por desgracia, Madrid es donde se re‚àö‚à´nen la mayor‚àö‚â†a de casos en Espa‚àö¬±a.¬¨‚Ä†Los hospitales est‚àö¬∞n saturados y sufren la falta de material imprescindible para luchar contra el virus. Entre ellos, el Hospital de Getafe. La situaci‚àö‚â•n es conocida por todos: UCIs improvisadas, chubasqueros,¬¨‚Ä†bolsas de pl‚àö¬∞stico, esparadrapo... Ante la falta de EPIS, los enfermeros tienen que utilizar lo que tienen a mano para crear su propia vestimenta.¬¨‚Ä†Por esta raz‚àö‚â•n, queremos lanzar un crowdfunding cuyos fondos ir‚àö¬∞n destinados a ofrecer soporte al Hospital Universitario de Getafe , para¬¨‚Ä† que puedan contar con m‚àö¬∞s material y m‚àö¬∞s equipos.¬¨‚Ä†Somos Alicia Berm‚àö‚à´dez, Alicia Velilla y Vicente Dom‚àö‚â†nguez. Tres amigos que, tras experiencias de familiares y amigos que trabajan en el Hospital, decidimos unirnos para crear esta iniciativa.  Estamos en contacto directo con el hospital para que nos informen sobre el material necesario para la protecci‚àö‚â•n, tanto del personal como de los pacientes.¬¨‚Ä†Y, sobre todo, hacerlo de forma segura y eficaz. Nuestro fin es recaudar la mayor cantidad posible de dinero para comprar recursos y donarlos al hospital. Recalcamos, como hemos hecho hasta ahora, que no sabemos exactamente qu‚àö¬© va a pedirnos el hospital: mascarillas, guantes... campaigns.title: Flip Flip, Ding Ding! - Covid19 Survival Fund
campaigns.description: I'm Rex, the owner of Flip Flip, Ding Ding!¬¨‚Ä† I created this fundraiser because my crew and our beloved bar are in a tough spot due to the recent shut down of all bars in Washington state.¬¨‚Ä†  Flip Flip has been a mainstay in Seattle's pinball scene since opening in 2014.¬¨‚Ä† Over the years, it has become a home away from home for many,¬¨‚Ä† a place for old friends and new to meet up as a community for drinks and friendly competition.¬¨‚Ä† Since the March 16th state-wide mandate required all bars in Washington to immediately close their doors during the Covid19 pandemic,¬¨‚Ä† all income to the bar has stopped.¬¨‚Ä†   During this time, the bartenders have been laid off and await unemployment, our game operator is left with no income from the bar, our manager and a crew member have stayed on for repairs/cleaning and to keep the ship afloat until we open again.¬¨‚Ä†  Right now, the rent is due and there is no money coming in to pay it.¬¨‚Ä† So we are asking for YOUR HELP!  $2000 - Pays part of our rent (due on the 25th) $1000 - Helps our game operator $1000 - Helps our bartenders $3000 - Pays our remaining staff for repairs/cleaning  Please help with whatever you can while we weather this storm. We look forward to coming back online and seeing everyone together again soon!    From all of us at Flip Flip,¬¨‚Ä† THANK YOU!

While it's gut wrenching that this all happened right when they started their first national tour, we know this is affecting EVERYONE so please, only help if you can.¬¨‚Ä†  If you prefer, you can also purchase any of the 100+ high quality¬¨‚Ä† soundboards of their live concerts at any price you want here   https://spacebacon.bandcamp.com    As well as the following other options for donations. campaigns.title: Keep the vulnerable safe against Coronavirus
campaigns.description: Please join our movement to protect those that are at risk safe from CORONAVIRUS (COVID-19).    The Public Health England briefing states: As many as 80% of the population are expected to be infected with Covid-19 in the next 12 months, and up to 15% (7.9m people) may require hospitalisation and the NHS currently cannot support these numbers which sadly means that those who are the most vulnerable will be killed by the virus.  People over 60, and especially over 80, are particularly vulnerable to severe or fatal infection. As of right now, time is crucial in making sure that those who fall within these categories are kept safe.  Our main focus will be to get a team together as soon as possible to protect the elderly by reducing the rate at which the Coronavirus spreads to them, your donation will be spent on:   1. Touring the country to provide them with emergency hygiene parcels at these times of shortage containing SOAP, SHAMPOO, BODY WASH, TOILET PAPER, HAND SANITISER and HAND WASH.    2. Providing them with food packages that contain none perishable foods such as CANNED GOODS, PASTA, RICE.SUGAR, TEA AND CEREALS to name a few.    3. Have someone speak to them regularly at times of isolation to make sure that they don't feel lonely and that their mental health is also being looked after.¬¨‚Ä†   With your support, we can make this journey as easy as possible for them and help save the lives of thousands of people so in future when we look back we can truly say to ourselves that we did something for those that felt helpless.  Thank you
campaigns.location_city: Manchester, North West England, United Kingdom

campaigns.title: Need Handwashing Stations for Unhoused People
campaigns.description: During this critical time when we are trying to prevent the spread of covid-19 and protect our loved ones, we also have to rally around to¬¨‚Ä† support the unhoused people  in our communities. Right now, over 5,000 people in Berkeley and Oakland are experiencing homelessness.¬¨‚Ä†  People who live in tent encampments are at higher-risk of getting the virus because they live in close quarters and lack hygiene resources. Also, the disease is more likely to be life-threatening for them due to poor nutrition, chronic health conditions, and lack of access to health care.  Volunteers at the  Berkeley Free Clinic  have been visiting encampments to distribute supplies, and we noticed that residents at some encampments have  no way to wash their hands . The cities of Berkeley and Oakland have installed hand washing stations at various encampments, but we've discovered that there are at least 10 encampments that they have overlooked. We are trying to raise money to buy  2 hand washing stations (~$90 each with tax) for each of those 10 encampments , as well as hand soap and hand sanitizer dispensers. Any extra funds will go towards buying¬¨‚Ä†hand sanitizer bottles, water bottles, food,¬¨‚Ä†Tylenol, cold medicine, socks, masks, gloves, tents, informational fliers, porta-potties, harm reduction supplies,¬¨‚Ä†transportation¬¨‚Ä†to care, and other things that encampment residents request.   Our healthcare system and local governments are nearly stretched to the limit due to this epidemic, so it is up to each one of us to make sure our neighbors have the resources they need to protect themselves. In times like these, it is more important than ever to practice radical compassion and love.¬¨‚Ä†  Please support our efforts by donating. Anything helps!¬¨‚Ä†

campaigns.title: Please Help Paramedic Cadet as she battles Covid19
campaigns.description: Christell Cadet is an amazing young woman, sister, daughter, co-worker and friend who has been selfless in her career as an FDNY Paramedic.¬¨‚Ä†  Recently, she has become ill, and has been hospitalized in ICU/ Isolation from Covid-19.   She is on Oxygen 24/7.   She is in for a long battle: to recovery and life during her after care.   There is no word yet on when she will be discharged out of the hospital.  Let me tell you more about her:  Christell joined the FDNY as an EMT in January of 2012, nearly 2 years later she became a Paramedic and is currently stationed at Sta 47.  Christell is charasmatic, resilient, funny, and incredibly kind.     She understands the need for EMS during these difficult and trying times. She knows what being on the front lines of the fight against Covid-19 entails. She has always loved being the 1st line of defense and care in emergency medicine.   She wants all First Responders to know: ""Take care of yourselves first. Make sure you go home whole at the end of the day.""¬¨‚Ä†  She wants the world to know: ""Everyone is fighting the virus differently. Many thousands are recovering from it but its still a serious issue to be taken with precaution around others.""  Christell joined EMS out of love. Love for her community and strangers alike; making a difference in patients lives and helping all those she has come into contact with while working as an EMT and now as a Paramedic.¬¨‚Ä†  Please, let's band together, as a community, near and far, young and old,EMS and civilians and help Christell during her battle against Covid-19 and her continued battle when she is released, as her fight won't stop there.

campaigns.title: Coronavirus emergency Northern Italy - Rotary
campaigns.description: Rotary eClub Nuove Frontiere - Distretto 2050    Cremona (Italy) - A blue tent packed with masked medics in nylon overalls and rubber gloves greets patients outside an Italian hospital at the European epicentre of the new coronavirus epidemic.  Welcome to the ""sorting"" room: an urgently deployed army-style field hospital where people running a fever or showing other flu-like symptoms are tested for signs of COVID-19.  Due to the increasing of COVID-19 cases in north of Italy (3000+ cases and 100+ deaths), hospitals are in an emergency situations and they need additional equipments, in particular  non-invasive mechanical respirators .  Please support our cause and donate to help our medical teams to fight this emergency.  Thank you! Rotary eClub Nuove Frontiere - Distretto 2050     http://www.recnuovefrontiere.org/      https://www.rotary.org/en/rotary-monitors-coronavirus-outbreak      https://tg24.sky.it/salute-e-benessere/2020/03/03/coronavirus-ospedale-cremona.html      https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nBXJnj9kHZo      https://www.bangkokpost.com/world/1872069/italy-deploys-emergency-field-hospitals-to-fight-virus

Zonder onze gasten kunnen wij als onderneming simpelweg niet bestaan. De reden dat Chef Dennis Middeldorp dag in dag uit samen met zijn team de sterren van de hemel kookt is voor jullie, onze gasten.  De realiteit is dat we de komende 3 weken geen van onze gasten mogen verwelkomen, de impact daarvan is direct voelbaar, salarissen   leveranciers zullen niet kunnen worden betaald. Niet omdat we geen solide bedrijf zijn, wel omdat het gat wat nu valt te groot is om 'even' op te vangen.¬¨‚Ä†  We roepen jullie hulp in voor de continuiteit van Sense Restaurant, help onze dit gat op te vangen; salarissen en leveranciers zullen met jullie hulp betaald kunnen worden en dat is essentieel om deze klap op te kunnen vangen.¬¨‚Ä†  Wat krijgen jullie terug voor jullie steun? Naast intense dankbaarheid een tegoedbon t.w.v. hetzelfde bedrag wat ge‚àö√ònvesteerd is ‚àö¬©n een glas champagne wanneer we samen vieren dat we er nog zijn. En zullen blijven. De eerste van de maand april zullen we starten met het uitgeven van de cadeaubonnen en nemen we contact met je op!   Wil je een gift geven? Doneer dan anoniem :-)  In tijden van nood hebben we elkaar nodig, laten we er zijn voor elkaar. Voor nu, blijf veilig en zorg goed voor je naasten!  Dank, ¬¨‚Ä†inmense dank en hopelijk tot snel.  Warme groet,  Dennis Middeldorp   team Sense   www.senserestaurant.nl

campaigns.title: Support Court of Gamers COVID-19 Relief
campaigns.description: Hey, hon, welcome in!""  It's words that I've said on a daily basis since I finally completed my dream of opening Court of Gamers, running my own business. I tell the story all the time, how the really beat up open close sign hanging in our front window has been under my bed since I was four years old and boldly claimed to my parents that I was only ever going to work for myself. Not exactly how it worked out, but close enough for me to still happily flip that sign every single day.  Court of Gamers is a family. I can't tell you how many times I've heard the words ""Coming here is like coming to a friends house."" it's what I strive for every day. We're a place to escape the world that is stressful and hard. The idea of losing CoG (As she's affectionately known) terrifies me to my core.  The last few days have been filled with tears as I have stressed over my small business. But I know I'm not alone in this. COVID-19 is threatening small businesses, non-profits, and so many more. Which is why we're running our GoFundMe a little bit differently than others.  We know you can only donate so much, and money can only go so far. That's why Court of Gamers, is going to help others. A portion of your donations will go to help other small businesses, most specifically a small Chinese restaurant. If you've been to CoG, you've probably been to the wonderful Tang St. They're a second family to us, and neither of us want to continue without the other.  Secondly we're going to be giving a portion to Thrive Youth Center. Thrive is an amazing wonderful place. I've been so fortunate I've never needed their help, but so many LGBTQ kids do. With colleges closing people are forced to go home right now, and sometimes home isn't the best place, or even worse, not an option.  Court of Gamers has never been about me, my store, my life. It's always been about you, even if you reading this has never been into CoG. It doesn't really matter. CoG has always been there for you, a safe haven, an inclusive haven. With your help and with the help of #SmallBusinessRelief, we're not going anywhere. We're going to help our neighbors in these trying times. We will see the other side of COVID-19  Thank you so much for taking the time to read this, and thank you even more if you hit that donate button. May the days ahead be better than those behind us.  Sondra

campaigns.description: ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä†Sister Lakes Restaurant‚Äö√Ñ√¥s/Breweries¬¨‚Ä†  ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä†Lakeview Inn - Dockside Dan‚Äö√Ñ√¥s  ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† Sister Lakes Brewery - BT‚Äö√Ñ√¥s Pub  They take care of us, now, let‚Äö√Ñ√¥s take care of them.¬¨‚Ä†  We are in the early innings of the COVID-19 battle and our beloved restaurants will be feeling the  squeeze.¬¨‚Ä†  Gov. campaigns.description: I am raising money to help people with the corona virus such as me. Please Help.

campaigns.title: Business Devastated by COVID-19
campaigns.description: WowCater,  www.wowcater.com , was one of the first and hardest hit businesses in California by the Coronavirus. We are the newest office catering service and don't have investors, making us highly vulnerable to the economic hardship of this outbreak.  Over the last week, starting 3/9/20, our business lost 100% of its business in one week. We have over a dozen employees and need this money for payroll and to pay other bills.  Your funds will help us pay our employees so they can afford things like rent and groceries etc. Further details of this is at the very bottom.  Any extra money will be used to help expand the business.¬¨‚Ä†  Your funds will also be immediately used to keep WowCater in business. This helps an entire community of people through all the other small businesses that WowCater impacts (local restaurants and catering kitchens) These small businesses depend on us to help support and grow their businesses. If WowCater goes out of business it could start a chain reaction with other local businesses.  We are a small local business in the San Francisco Bay Area. The business was built debt free and free of other financial help. We wanted to keep it that way but the situation with COVID-19 has completely and utterly destroyed our business. Our net revenue is now $0. WowCater connects offices with local restaurants and kitchens and provides the delivery of these meals as well. WowCater does not cook any food, so there is no other source of income for us.  WowCater provides local offices with daily/weekly catered lunches or other meals. With the outbreak, all our customers have decided to work from home. We are destitute and are is desperate need of help.  The good news is that this situation is temporary and when everything blows over, our customers have committed to resume business with us. We just need help to survive until then.   Over the next few years WowCater will expand into several other cities. We are the newest office catering service. Unlike most of our competitors we deliver the food ourselves. This ensures the delivery is timely and our customers receive GPS tracking. We have the most high tech platform that is highly automated and our software can order food based on each office's unique preferences. Customers have an online dashboard to view their menus and request changes. We have Slack integrations to allow a message to be sent to all employees that says ""Lunch is ready"" as soon as our catering specialist clicks ""complete"" on the app. We check that setups are done correctly through the photos that our employees are required to upload in the app as well. We've sourced the best kitchens and offer only the best food.¬¨‚Ä†  All of us at WowCater are so very grateful for your help! It means the world to us! We have no other options and your help ensures that our company can survive this and provide our much needed service for many years to come.  From all of us at WowCater, THANK YOU!  EMPLOYEE PAY: If we only reach less than 50% of our goal, that percentage will be the same that we pay employees. For instance, if 30% of the goal is reached, we will pay our employees 30% of their normal wages. (Normal wages will be calculated as the average pay they received, calculated since the beginning of the year to March 1st.) If we reach 20% of the goal employees will receive 20% their average pay etc.   Here's where it gets interesting, once we pass 50% of our goal, the amount we pay our employees goes up 20%. For instance, if we reach 51% of our goal, we will pay our employees 71% of average pay! 65% of the goal, we pay 85% average payroll. This will continue until it reaches 100%

campaigns.title: Cardiff Covid19 virtual hands
campaigns.description: This is a Cardiff network emergency fund to help each other out during the Covid19/ coronavirus pandemic.¬¨‚Ä†  Me and a group of friends/volunteers will be helping people who are self isolating / are elderly/ disabled or have exceptional circumstances and need any food, essential items being delivered to them.¬¨‚Ä†  Support will also be provided to people who can't afford to keep themselves and their families safe from the virus.¬¨‚Ä†  Every life matters and as the virus spreads in Wales, let's join hands and bring the community culture back.¬¨‚Ä†  Many people;¬¨‚Ä†  Can‚Äö√Ñ√¥t afford basic hygiene essentials like hand wash, soap and hand sanitiser that will help protect them from infection.  Can't stockup basic things¬¨‚Ä†  Cannot rely on food banks as many are have less essential items due to people stock piling, food banks supplies are running fast  Live in refuges or shelters¬¨‚Ä†  And many may have a lit of things which they are not able to share it open.  I helped many immigrants in the past who had been out of work due to ""hostile environment"" policies and helped voluntarily day and night.¬¨‚Ä†   I am also asking others to come and help me deliver food/basic essentials for those who need; it in and around Cardiff.¬¨‚Ä†   Let's support those who can‚Äö√Ñ√¥t afford to take extra precautions or are self isolating;¬¨‚Ä† to help keep them safe from what has been labelled ‚Äö√Ñ√≤the worst public health crisis for a generation‚Äö√Ñ√¥, coronavirus (COVID-19).  Your support will help us to provide emergency hygiene/food parcels that will help protect those at higher risk and more vulnerable to being infected by the virus.¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†   YOUR DONATION WILL BE SPENT ON:  - SOAP (adult   baby) - BODYWASH - HANDWASH - HAND SANTISER - LAUNDRY DETERGENT -FOOD ITEMS¬¨‚Ä†  And basic money for fuel for the volunteers delivering.¬¨‚Ä†  This service will cover in and around Cardiff.¬¨‚Ä†  Any donations left will be shared with local charities helping vulnerable; NHS trusts and homeless shelters.¬¨‚Ä†  We were given 2 hands to help one another.¬¨‚Ä†  Lets join together and help our communities and loved ones.

campaigns.title: SUPPORT CHINA FIGHT CORONA VIRUS
campaigns.description: We are dedicated to provide disposable Surgical face mask to help fight against the spread of the deadly Corona Virus. Th shortage of these mask in most parts of the country have lead to more and more people being infected by the virus everyday and more deaths recorded. Lets come together and combat the spread of this deadly virus by supporting this campaign, all contributions are highly appreciated,  The CORONA VIRUS keeps spreading like wild fire every day despite the Chinese governments efforts to combat the spread. More and more people get infected every day, death toll is also on the rise. Locals and foreigners are at risk of contracting the virus. Businesses is very slow due to due to restrictions by some countries imposed on Chinese. Travel restrictions are being imposed everyday from China.   Russia has decided to ban Chinese nationals from entering its territory amid the COVID-19 corona virus outbreak.  Singapore has in effect banned all visitors from China, its biggest source of tourists, while some countries have advised against travel to Singapore which has one of the highest virus infection tallies outside China at 58.  The death toll from the corona virus epidemic is continuing to climb, Chinese officials said on Wednesday. Nationwide, 97 new deaths and 2,015 new cases emerged in the previous 24 hours, the national health authorities said.   https://www.nytimes.com/2020/02/11/world/asia/coronavirus-china.html   Countries with detected cases of the virus as of 20/02/2020  In mainland China, 2,004¬¨‚Ä†people have died, while¬¨‚Ä†74,185¬¨‚Ä†infections have been confirmed, according to government figures. campaigns.title: Help us to stop Corona Virus from Spreading
campaigns.description: Is coronavirus outbreak the end of the Human race?  Is the world rambling gradually towards death?  15000 reported corona cases in Itlay, 2600 in Spain, 2500 in France,1800 in Germany, 1500 in USA , hundreds of cases in UK...¬¨‚Ä†  A total of 109,936 cases have been reported from all around the world until this day in which more then 5000 people lost their lives.  Most of us have lost someone they loved to some horrifying accident or a deadly disease. Imagine the pain people go through when they see their loved ones suffering yet can‚Äö√Ñ√¥t do anything to take that pain away.¬¨‚Ä†  This feeling of helplessness is insufferable. Even though the world is already facing lot of problems, there is a new battle which seems like all of us are losing, ¬¨‚Ä†the ‚Äö√Ñ√∫CORONA VIRUS OUTBREAK‚Äö√Ñ√π.¬¨‚Ä†  The faces of tired health workers lined from wearing surgical masks and safety goggles for hours, anonymous donation by the retirees, shaved heads of women, a sign of devotion. How far can we go to save someone we love?  We are facing the most frightening war of the century. The war against ‚Äö√Ñ√∫CORONA VIRUS ‚Äö√Ñ√∫.  Help us to make a platform to keep people safe from this deady virus.  Introducing ‚Äö√Ñ√∫No Corona‚Äö√Ñ√π a consultancy app, accessible to everyone. The key purpose of this ‚Äö√Ñ√∫No corona‚Äö√Ñ√π app is to provide specialist consultancy to the people in dire need. If anyone thinks that they may have coronavirus symptoms, Our medical experts will guide them through the safety procedures to prevent the virus from spreading. In addition to this, free sanitized water and facemasks will be provided in the affected areas where people don‚Äö√Ñ√¥t have access due to supply shortage and high costs. Also, our team will utilize the app funds to offer fully funded or split air tickets to the people stuck in the affected areas and can‚Äö√Ñ√¥t get back to their families. The goal is to make sure they can get back home safely.  Help us win the battle against coronavirus, DONATE and MAKE A DIFFERENCE. Because carrying the coffin of a loved one is the heaviest and when you don‚Äö√Ñ√¥t know which one to carry and which one to burry.  Be the change you want to see in the world‚Äö√Ñ√π. This worlds always needs a hero, YOU CAN BE ONE! Because it‚Äö√Ñ√¥s not just the WORLD, it‚Äö√Ñ√¥s FAMILY!

campaigns.title: Help Flamingos survive the Covid-19 crisis
campaigns.description: Help keep a vital part of the community alive! Flamingos Coffee House needs your help.   Opening its doors to the local LGBTQ+ community and beyond in 2018, Flamingos Coffee House has been a vital part of the Leeds scene since, providing a safe space for local LGBTQ+ groups, raising money for charity and being a much needed dry space to spend time with friends and family in a welcoming environment.   We as a country are facing an unprecedented challenge in Covid-19 and we all have a responsibility to help keep those vulnerable to the virus safe. For James and the staff at Flamingos this means extra time spent deep cleaning and disinfecting, but for many customers it sadly means staying at home isolated from the illness. This means that Flamingos is in danger; takings have already dropped and are only set to drop further as more and more people are forced to self-isolate, work from home or even spend time in hospital.   Nobody wants to loose Flamingos as the meeting space, socialising space and stuffing-face-with-cake space so we want to raise money to cover the lost money so James can continue paying rent, bills, suppliers and, most importantly, his staff (who are on proper contracts - not nasty zero hours contracts) - themselves valued members of our community.   ¬¨¬£10000 would not cover everything but would go a long way to allowing Flamingos survive this crisis and come out the other side live, kicking and ready to give back to the community as only they are capable of.   We will be regularly posting stories and quotes from its many customers and devotees expressing just how much this space means to them.
campaigns.location_city: Leeds, Yorkshire and the Humber, United Kingdom

campaigns.title: COVID-19 Fondi salva microimprese
campaigns.description: All‚Äö√Ñ√¥uomo, sin dall‚Äö√Ñ√¥alba dei tempi, spetta un compito importante: l‚Äö√Ñ√¥adattamento. L‚Äö√Ñ√¥essere umano ha conosciuto numerose evoluzioni, nel corso dei secoli. ‚àö√† stato ‚Äö√Ñ√∫Abilis‚Äö√Ñ√π, ‚àö¬Æ stato ‚Äö√Ñ√∫Erectus‚Äö√Ñ√π, ‚àö¬Æ stato ‚Äö√Ñ√∫Sapiens‚Äö√Ñ√π, ‚àö¬Æ stato ‚Äö√Ñ√∫Sapiens Sapiens‚Äö√Ñ√π.   Ci‚àö‚â§ che l‚Äö√Ñ√¥uomo dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥era moderna ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ a tratti ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ ignora, ‚àö¬Æ che la sua evoluzione non ‚àö¬Æ terminata: all‚Äö√Ñ√¥uomo, per sempre, sar‚àö‚Ä† chiesto di adattarsi e ri-adattarsi all‚Äö√Ñ√¥ambiente circostante, alla societ‚àö‚Ä† civile, economica e politica che impone trasformazioni individuali e collettive.   L‚Äö√Ñ√¥uomo, per‚àö‚â§, come tutti gli altri animali, ‚àö¬Æ un essere istintivo: istintivamente reagisce ai cambiamenti e alle trasformazioni con la ‚Äö√Ñ√∫paura‚Äö√Ñ√π. La paura ‚àö¬Æ uno dei sentimenti pi‚àöœÄ immediati della natura umana e anche quello che pi‚àöœÄ rischia di assoggettarci all‚Äö√Ñ√¥immobilismo.  Funzionalmente l‚Äö√Ñ√¥uomo ‚àö¬Æ chiamato a rispondere: i periodi di grande mutamento, le crisi sociali o psicologiche richiedono una grande predisposizione al coraggio; non possiamo perdere la sfida dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥evoluzione; non possiamo rassegnarci alla passivit‚àö‚Ä†.  Nei periodi bui dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥umanit‚àö‚Ä†, quelli che oggi conosciamo attraverso le pagine dei libri di storia, l‚Äö√Ñ√¥evoluzione non si ‚àö¬Æ fermata; il progresso, che aveva lo stesso nome anche nel Medioevo (per antonomasia il periodo pi‚àöœÄ buio nella storia dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥uomo), non si ‚àö¬Æ mai arrestato. Tutte le epoche storiche hanno conosciuto grandi menti: poeti, artisti, filosofi, tutti rispondevano a un solo richiamo; la voglia di andare avanti.  Andare avanti, spesso, sembra impossibile; andareavanti, a volte, pu‚àö‚â§ sembrare un controsenso, una contro-evoluzione. Andare avanti, per‚àö‚â§, ‚àö¬Æ l‚Äö√Ñ√¥unico sforzo a cui siamo chiamati: la mente dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥uomo non ‚àö¬Æ predisposta ai vincoli e alle limitazioni; ‚àö¬Æ per questo motivo, dunque, che bisogna attivarsi concretamente per poter abbattere tutte le barriere, formali e intuitive, che, spesso, altri uomini ci frappongono sul cammino.  Quello che sta vivendo l‚Äö√Ñ√¥Italia, nell‚Äö√Ñ√¥ultimo periodo, sembra un po‚Äö√Ñ√¥ la trasposizione moderna del Medioevo: la gente ha timore di poter morire dall‚Äö√Ñ√¥oggi al domani, ha paura di poter contagiare un altro anche solo tendendogli la mano, ha paura di precipitare nell‚Äö√Ñ√¥oscurantismo e si aggrappa a quello che percepisce come unico mezzo per la salvaguardia del bene comune: Dio.  Noi, per‚àö‚â§, non siamo nel Medioevo e, soprattutto, da cittadini evoluti e abitanti del mondo sappiamo che, persino quell‚Äö√Ñ√¥epoca, ci ha lasciato qualcosa da cui poter ripartire.  Il ventunesimo secolo ‚àö¬Æ il secolo delle sfide e della velocit‚àö‚Ä†: solo chi ha fame pu‚àö‚â§ sopravvivere, solo chi riesce ad adattarsi, in moto perpetuo, pu‚àö‚â§ aspirare alla luce del sole.  Chi ha fame, per‚àö‚â§, pu‚àö‚â§ provare comunque e istintivamente paura: ‚àö¬Æ per questo che, nei momenti di disperazione, bisogna cercare un cammino comune; qualcosa che, ancora di pi‚àöœÄ, ci faccia percepire l‚Äö√Ñ√¥appartenenza a un unico grande genere: l‚Äö√Ñ√¥umanit‚àö‚Ä†.  ‚àö√† per questo motivo che sono qui per presentarti un progetto; un progetto che non sia esclusivo alle capacit‚àö‚Ä† di poche persone ma che possa accorpare quanti pi‚àöœÄ protagonisti dello stesso palcoscenico.   Mi rivolgo a tutti gli imprenditori delle piccole e medie imprese e anche a quelli delle micro imprese.   La crisi ‚àö¬Æ un effetto domino: prima c‚Äö√Ñ√¥‚àö¬Æ lei da sola, poi c‚Äö√Ñ√¥‚àö¬Æ la crisi della crisi e, alla fine, c‚Äö√Ñ√¥‚àö¬Æ la nevrosi. In un momento di nevrosi collettiva, dunque, lascia che ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ nel mio piccolo ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ possa parlarti di qualcosa che ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ spero ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ possa fare la differenza e possa portare l‚Äö√Ñ√¥ago della bussola a tendere verso un nuovo orizzonte.   Quello che voglio costituire ‚àö¬Æ un fondo ‚Äö√Ñ√∫paracadute‚Äö√Ñ√πper le micro-imprese: lo scopo ‚àö¬Æ dare vita a una raccolta fondi intestato a una ONLUS che lavorer‚àö‚Ä† per salvaguardare le piccole e micro imprese italiane. Nell‚Äö√Ñ√¥80% dei casi le aziende sono abbandonate a se stesse: vanno in insofferenza bancaria, non riescono a ottemperare gli assegni bancari. Mi riferisco anche a piccole cifre: anche solo 400 ‚Äö√á¬® possono determinare il futuro di un‚Äö√Ñ√¥azienda; molto spesso tutto ci‚àö‚â§ corrisponde anche a sbagliate tempistiche: prima delle festivit‚àö‚Ä† un‚Äö√Ñ√¥azienda potrebbe andare in sofferenza; ancora, in un periodo particolarmente critico un‚Äö√Ñ√¥azienda potrebbe conoscere deficit.   Lo scopo di questo fondo, dunque, sarebbe aiutare le aziende: essendo un fondo di aiuto per extremis, non pu‚àö‚â§ essere utilizzato pi‚àöœÄ di una sola volta per ogni azienda, bens‚àö¬® saranno pi‚àöœÄ aziende a poterne beneficiare nell‚Äö√Ñ√¥arco di vita stessa della ONLUS.   Questo ‚àö¬Æ un fondo ‚Äö√Ñ√∫perduto‚Äö√Ñ√π: le aziende che ne beneficeranno non dovranno restituire nulla, nessun centesimo; se non ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ solo di fronte a casi benevoli ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ potr‚àö‚Ä† restituire i soldi A TASSO ZERO, semplicemente per aiutare un‚Äö√Ñ√¥altra impresa. Lo scopo, dunque, ‚àö¬Æ creare un fondo rotativo, un circolo virtuoso: non ‚àö¬Æ un finanziamento ma un prestito a tasso zero che comporta zero spese. Nel momento in cui l‚Äö√Ñ√¥azienda sar‚àö‚Ä† in piena capacit‚àö‚Ä† di poter restituire i soldi presi, l‚Äö√Ñ√¥ONLUS sar‚àö‚Ä† ben disposta ad accettare l‚Äö√Ñ√¥accredito; in caso contrario, se l‚Äö√Ñ√¥azienda non avesse ancora recuperato la sua indipendenza economica, non le sar‚àö‚Ä† chiesto di restituire ci‚àö‚â§ di cui ha beneficiato.  Le aziende potranno richiedere questa sorta di finanziamento solo ed esclusivamente attraverso l‚Äö√Ñ√¥invio dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥estratto conto bancario e dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥assegno che sta per essere protestato: solo quando ci sar‚àö‚Ä† la chiara visione dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥assegno che sta per andare in protesta e solo quando ci sar‚àö‚Ä† la visione dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥estratto conto bancario a riprovadella situazione bancaria di deficit, solo in questo caso si potranno versare questi finanziamenti per la salvaguardia e la tutela economica dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥azienda richiedente.   Per di pi‚àöœÄ: con i finanziamenti di questo fondo potranno essere pagati dei professionisti che aiuteranno le aziende a evitare proprio questi problemi; si offriranno, dunque, consulenze aziendali che toccano anche il tema della digitalizzazione, ormai all‚Äö√Ñ√¥ordine del giorno nella costruzione dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥assetto aziendale. Tutto ci‚àö‚â§ ‚àö¬Æ a costo zero: ci sar‚àö‚Ä† un team di esperti ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ pagati internamente alla ONLUS ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ che avr‚àö‚Ä† il solo compito di aiutare le aziende a titolo pro bono.   Questa, ‚àö¬Æ bene che si sappia, ‚àö¬Æ un‚Äö√Ñ√¥idea estremamenteembrionale, ‚àö¬Æ solo una bozza di pensiero che ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ mi auguro ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ possa essere accolta da tutti gli imprenditori che si ritrovano spesso (tacitamente) a vivere la stessa condizione di abbandono e arresa: questo ‚àö¬Æ un modo per aiutare le aziende, non vi ‚àö¬Æ alcun scopo di lucro e va oltre qualsiasi preconcetto: tra queste righe non vi ‚àö¬Æ alcun assetto politico, perch‚àö¬© la politica non pu‚àö‚â§ entrare nella nostra storia.  Questo ‚àö¬Æ un aiuto DAGLI IMPRENDITORI, PER GLI IMPRENDITORI.

campaigns.title: In Rememberance of Fabi
campaigns.description: On January 3, 2017, my sister Fabiola Rodriguez, never made it back home. She was a woman of grace and vivacity, always cheerful to be around. Despite this, her life was unexpectedly taken away while she vacationed in Mexico. She never got to wake up to kiss her daughter, Viviana in the morning or to comfort her oldest son Adrian, who was waiting for her return.  Words just simply cannot express how much pain this immense loss has inflicted on our entire family, especially for her children. We are asking for your prayers during this difficult time including any support to cover her funeral costs and expenses. Any amount will be genuinely appreciated as it would greatly help to lessen the financial burden and give her the proper honor and memorial that my sister deserves.  Please feel free to share this to let others know. God bless. Isaiah 33:2 Lord, be gracious to us, we long for you. Be our strength every morning, our salvation in time of distress. //  El 3 de enero del 2017, mi hermana Fabiola Rodr‚àö‚â†guez, nunca regres‚àö‚â• a casa. Era una mujer de gracia y vivacidad, siempre alegre cuando estaba cerca. A pesar de esto, su vida fue inesperadamente robada mientras estaba de vacaciones en M‚àö¬©xico. Ella nunca lleg‚àö‚â• a despertar en la ma‚àö¬±ana¬¨‚Ä†para besar a su hija, Viviana ¬¨‚Ä†o para consolar a su hijo mayor Adrian, que estaba esperando su regreso.  Las palabras simplemente no pueden expresar cu‚àö¬∞nto dolor ha causado la inmensa p‚àö¬©rdida a toda nuestra familia, especialmente a sus hijos. Estamos pidiendo sus oraciones durante este tiempo dif‚àö‚â†cil, incluyendo cualquier apoyo para cubrir sus gastos y gastos de funeral. Cualquier cantidad ser‚àö¬∞ genuinamente apreciada, ya que ser‚àö‚â†a de gran ayuda para disminuir los gastos financieros y darle el honor y el recuerdo que mi hermana merece.  Por favor, si‚àö¬©ntase libre de compartir esto para que otros sepan. Dios los bendiga siempre. Isa‚àö‚â†as 33: 2- Se‚àö¬±or, ten piedad en nosotros, te anhelamos. S‚àö¬©a nuestra fortaleza cada ma‚àö¬±ana, nuestra salvaci‚àö‚â•n en tiempo de angustia.

campaigns.title: Fight COVID-19 with Eterna
campaigns.description: WITH YOUR HELP, ETERNA CAN DEVELOP A SAFE mRNA VACCINE AGAINST COVID-19 IN TIME TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE.   With the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic, the  Eterna  project is looking to harness online gamers toward a solution. Their mission? To develop a safe mRNA vaccine as well as future challenges to create new antivirals and improved diagnostics. As part of this effort, the team is raising funds to bring on a software developer and an instructional designer (and/or game designer) to expand the capabilities of Eterna.   Fighting COVID-19 with a Safe mRNA Vaccine  Over the next few weeks, Eterna is attempting to develop an RNA vaccine with:¬¨‚Ä†  (1) improved in-patient production so that smaller amounts of RNA can be used, which decreases the risk of an adverse immune response  (2) increased stability in syringes so that a vaccine can be stored and distributed ready-to-go, and  (3) the ability to be turned off with a pill or a cream, to stop an adverse immune response among the small percentage of people who will get such a response.  For an RNA vaccine to be safe, it must have all three of these properties. Eterna will design RNA puzzles that attempt to satisfy these criteria, and winning designs will be experimentally tested by scientists. Because the biology of COVID-19 and vaccines is complex, our first priority is to get the Eterna community ready to design the ‚Äö√Ñ√∫real‚Äö√Ñ√π medicines. We need as many online gamers as possible who are skilled enough to identify RNA designs with the potential to be a vaccine.   JOIN US IN STOPPING COVID-19 BY ENABLING ONLINE GAMERS AROUND THE WORLD TO BECOME HIGHLY SKILLED AT ETERNA AS QUICKLY AS POSSIBLE.  Your contribution will achieve these goals:  GOAL #1:  Make Eterna playable on mobile phones so that gamers worldwide can participate, increasing the size of Eterna‚Äö√Ñ√¥s playerbase able to tackle the COVID-19 challenge.   GOAL #2:  Create training materials that bring new players of Eterna up to speed fast.  This will include puzzles with preparation specific to COVID-19.  GOAL #3:  Develop digital curricula for secondary and postsecondary students who must for the foreseeable future stay at home for their education.  This learning material will be shared with online educational services such as Khan Academy, so that globally students can engage in the fight against COVID-19 and ‚Äö√Ñ√∫know the enemy.‚Äö√Ñ√π   About Eterna  Eterna is a citizen science videogame and research platform where players solve puzzles using RNA‚Äö√Ñ√¥s four bases to design RNAs with specific properties, including stability, transformation, and calculation. Eterna has been featured in publications such as  Wired , the  New York Times , the  Wall Street Journal ,  CNN , and  NOVA . The project has tackled challenges such as the development of a  fast, low-cost tuberculosis diagnostic  (the disease being one of the world‚Äö√Ñ√¥s largest public health crises),  improving the safety of CRISPR gene editing ¬¨‚Ä†, and  enabling ribosome engineering to develop novel materials .  Through the abstraction of a puzzle/logic game, individuals with no scientific background are able to make meaningful contributions to areas such as fundamental biochemistry, diagnostics, therapeutics, material design, and more. To date, more than 100,000 players have joined and played.  RNA is an extremely powerful molecule at the heart of many cellular processes, carrying out its functions by folding into complex shapes. RNA research has the potential to lead to breakthroughs in diagnosing and treating the most prevalent and dangerous diseases and even the development of technologies outside of medicine that are impossible through conventional means. However, scientists don‚Äö√Ñ√¥t fully understand the behavior of RNA. Creating synthetic designs to carry out a specific function and predicting how well they will perform when created are extremely difficult - but the diverse community of Eterna players, representing a wide variety of ages, locations, and backgrounds, are able to tackle this challenge head on, and have done so with great success.  Eterna players explore the broad solution space of RNA design by collectively using knowledge of science together with human observation and intuition. The Eterna player community consistently performs better than software packages. Eterna has published  multiple papers  on their findings. Principle Investigator Rhiju Das wrote  this review  about how citizen science games are changing research.   THANK YOU FOR HELPING ETERNA FIGHT COVID-19!   In the future, you can donate to Eterna  here .     More About the Campaign   GOAL #1.  Implementing Mobile Playability : Allowing Eterna to be playable on mobile devices will greatly increase its reach, including to potential players in areas most affected by the pandemic in Europe and Asia. We will have a software developer update Eterna‚Äö√Ñ√¥s user interface to allow for streamlined usage on smaller screens and touchscreens.  GOAL #2.  Improving Player Onboarding : We will employ an instructional designer and/or game designer to redesign tutorials that allow new players to learn Eterna more rapidly and gain better skill sets, as well as create new tutorials and other training specific to the upcoming COVID-19 challenge. There is a significant opportunity to develop tutorials that lower the learning curve, maximize engagement, and ultimately lead to more and more knowledgeable players contributing to Eterna. We may also want a software developer to revise the current website and game code to allow us to carry out new teaching strategies.  GOAL #3.  Developing Educational Curricula : With the closure of schools due to COVID-19, there is significant interest in digital learning curricula. Eterna previously partnered with NOVA Labs through WGBH Boston to create educational content that introduces RNA and its biological role. We are already developing puzzles and materials specific to COVID-19, so we would like to develop new modules in a similar format. This will require further assistance from an instructional designer to create targeted materials (specifically for a secondary and postsecondary audience), as well as a software developer to either update the existing NOVA Labs infrastructure (which is partially built on Flash, is soon to be unavailable, and may or may not be easily extended for new modules) or create a novel platform for producing educational lessons with Eterna.  Any remaining funds will be used to support ongoing software development and research projects that further Eterna‚Äö√Ñ√¥s mission to empower citizen scientists to contribute to breakthroughs in medicine and biotechnology.

campaigns.title: Help AS Roma tackle Covid-19
campaigns.description: Italy is hurting badly as the number of cases of COVID-19, the official name for the coronavirus, soars. With more than 10,000 cases and counting, Italy has the second-highest reported death toll and number of confirmed infected cases, behind only China.   With over 800 fatalities,¬¨‚Ä†Italy‚Äö√Ñ√¥s death toll¬¨‚Ä†is significantly higher than the next three hardest-hit nations combined.  Now AS Roma and our foundation, Roma Cares, want to help raise much-needed funds to help Lazzaro Spallanzani Hospital in Rome deal with the crisis. The hospital is at the epicenter of the battle in Italy to save the lives of those infected by the disease all over the country.   Amongst the first cases treated by the hospital were the two Chinese tourists who contracted the virus in their homeland, and who are now recovering.  Given the national emergency, the money we are hoping to raise with the help of you, the public, will be used by the hospital to purchase clinical diagnostic equipment to improve infected patient care and essential supplies to facilitate the work of the doctors and nurses treating the virus.  Every donation, big or small, can help save someone's life.  ______________________________________________________________________________  L'Italia sta vivendo giorni di grande sofferenza a causa del COVID-19, pi‚àöœÄ conosciuto come Coronavirus. Con oltre 10.000 casi accertati, il nostro Paese ‚àö¬Æ secondo solo alla Cina per numero di contagi e le vittime hanno superato quota 800.  L‚Äö√Ñ√¥AS Roma, assieme alla sua fondazione Roma Cares, vuole aiutare a raccogliere i fondi necessari per aiutare l'ospedale Lazzaro Spallanzani ad affrontare questa crisi. L'istituto nazionale per le malattie infettive, che ha sede nella Capitale, ‚àö¬Æ infatti uno dei centri che sta combattendo in prima linea la battaglia contro il Coronavirus. I was suppose to start my first day of work Monday, but due to the coronavirus crisis, I was just informed that my starting date had been delayed. At this time, they don't not know how long until they will reopen. I want to make sure my little family and I prepared for the worst. I come to you for help, getting me through the next few weeks.¬¨‚Ä† Funds will not only help with bills, but will help take care of my two basset hounds.¬¨‚Ä† These funds will pay for their food, and for an upcoming appointment with their vet.
