campaigns.title: Youth-Link COVID-19 Fundraiser
campaigns.description: As the world grapples with the unprecedented rise of novel coronavirus (COVID-19) cases, medical professionals have struggled to find resources to care for patients. At hospitals all over Oregon, shortages of face masks, swabs, and other protective gear leave doctors and nurses risking their lives to provide adequate treatment. The crisis has gotten so dire that Providence hospitals are resorting to asking volunteers to sew medical masks by hand for caregivers.¬¨‚Ä†  Youth-Link, a student-led group striving to provide online education services for our local community during this unprecedented time, has stepped forwards to lead the effort in supporting our doctors and nurses in this critical time of need.  Our goal is to raise $8,000 to purchase 2000 surgery masks, 2000 face shields, and 2000 KN95 masks. We need your support more than ever. Already, Oregon has more than 115 cases of COVID-19 and 3 deaths. Money and facemask donations during this time will allow doctors and caregivers to continue administering treatment to those in need.¬¨‚Ä†  Please help us spread the word by contributing today and by sharing this GoFundMe. We're all in this together.  Connect with Youth-Link on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter: @youthlinkpdx

Soo now I'm here while once again trying to pick up the pieces and start anew.¬¨‚Ä†  This is the absolute last thing I wanted to do, anyone who knows me knows I take pride in being independent, but I guess we all face a time where we need some help.¬¨‚Ä†   3 y'all - and if you want a virtual happy hour buddy, hit me up! ¬¨‚Ä† o ooo

campaigns.title: Corona-Krise: Helft Valentinas Backsalon!

Katrin hat all ihr Herzblut und ihre R‚àö¬∫cklagen in ihr Caf‚àö¬© ""Valentinas Backsalon"" im Grindelviertel gesteckt  und dort bisher gl‚àö¬∫cklichen Kunden k‚àö‚àÇstliche Kuchen und Torten serviert, die von ihr und von RentnerInnen gebacken wurden, die mit ihr arbeiten und sich so etwas zu ihrer (bekanntlich oft geringen) Rente dazuverdienen k‚àö‚àÇnnen.  Im letzten und in diesem Jahr hat sie auch abseits der Krise viele pers‚àö‚àÇnliche R‚àö¬∫ckschl‚àö¬ßge erlebt, und trotzdem bisher immer weiter gek‚àö¬ßmpft.    Katrin sieht momentan keinen Ausweg und bef‚àö¬∫rchtet, dass sie ihr kleines Caf‚àö¬© nach der Krise aufgeben muss. campaigns.title: Voluntarios COVID19
campaigns.description: Aporta tu granito de arena y colabora con Voluntarios COVID-19 para poder llevar a cabo esta iniciativa en la provincia de Segovia e intentar ampliarla al resto de Espa‚àö¬±a. ¬¨¬∞Es el momento de unirse y ayudar a los que tienen mayor riesgo! ¬¨¬∞Cualquier peque‚àö¬±o gesto en estos momentos es un mundo!    Si quieres saber m‚àö¬∞s:  Poco queda ya por explicar de la dif‚àö‚â†cil situaci‚àö‚â•n que vive el mundo actualmente. Nos encontramos ante la que probablemente sea la mayor crisis sanitaria del ‚àö‚à´ltimo siglo y, desafortunadamente, parece que tanto los sistemas de prevenci‚àö‚â•n como los de respuesta no han conseguido frenar el avance de la epidemia, vi‚àö¬©ndose ahora desbordados.  Por ese motivo, con el objetivo de minimizar el impacto de la enfermedad sobre los grupos m‚àö¬∞s vulnerables de nuestra sociedad, ayudando as‚àö‚â† a reducir la carga de trabajo de nuestro sistema sanitario, se ha puesto en marcha una iniciativa en la ciudad de Segovia para ayudar a colectivos de riesgo con las tareas que les obligasen a abandonar su domicilio, exponi‚àö¬©ndolos al virus.  Esta iniciativa, totalmente altruista, ha comenzado por ayudar a nuestros mayores a realizar la compra, utilizando para ello a voluntarios que no pertenecen a grupos de riesgo.  Actualmente, todo este esfuerzo se ve realizado por un grupo de voluntarios cada vez mayor, pero que en estos momentos se est‚àö¬∞ viendo desbordado. Adem‚àö¬∞s, al ser el proyecto totalmente altruista y no aceptar ninguna remuneraci‚àö‚â•n por el servicio, tambi‚àö¬©n se ve enormemente limitado por los recursos econ‚àö‚â•micos de los voluntarios, que son los que est‚àö¬∞n teniendo cargar con los gastos.  ¬¨‚Ä†A pesar de todo esto, hemos visto una gran respuesta social. Prueba de ello son los contactos que hemos recibido tanto de instituciones como de medios de comunicaci‚àö‚â•n para ayudar a difundir el proyecto e incluso intentar escalarlo, o los m‚àö¬∞s de 600 seguidores que se han unido a nuestras redes desde su creaci‚àö‚â•n hace dos d‚àö‚â†as. Aun as‚àö‚â†, lo que m‚àö¬∞s nos ha sorprendido ha sido la gran cantidad de gente que ha pedido informaci‚àö‚â•n para participar como voluntarios, llegando a sumar m‚àö¬∞s de 100 solicitudes.  Esto nos a hecho darnos cuenta de que para nosotros esto es solo el comienzo. Creemos firmemente que la ‚àö‚à´nica forma de acabar con esta epidemia ser‚àö¬∞ con responsabilidad social y solidaridad, por lo que esperamos que esta iniciativa pueda seguir creciendo en otras ciudades de Espa‚àö¬±a y extendi‚àö¬©ndose a un mayor n‚àö‚à´mero de colectivos de riesgo, no solo a nivel sanitario sino tambi‚àö¬©n a nivel social.  Para hacer esto posible, tanto a nivel log‚àö‚â†stico como organizativo, hemos decidido poner en marcha esta campa‚àö¬±a para que el que lo desee pueda colaborar con nuestro proyecto. De esta forma podr‚àö¬©is aportar a la iniciativa sin salir de casa, financiando desde material sanitario, que nos permite proporcionar el servicio de forma segura, hasta gastos de transporte, con los que podremos ampliar nuestro radio de actuaci‚àö‚â•n, pudiendo as‚àö‚â† cubrir un porcentaje mayor de la poblaci‚àö‚â•n de riesgo.  Tambi‚àö¬©n quer‚àö‚â†amos puntualizar que cualquier excedente de este crowdfunding ser‚àö¬∞ devuelto al sistema p‚àö‚à´blico para que pueda ser utilizado para paliar las consecuencias de esta crisis, ya que el objetivo de esta iniciativa nunca ha sido el enriquecimiento personal de los involucrados.  Nos gustar‚àö‚â†a agradecer de antemano todas las donaciones, as‚àö‚â† como cualquier otra forma de colaboraci‚àö‚â•n. En estos momentos toda ayuda es bienvenida, ya sea con una aportaci‚àö‚â•n econ‚àö‚â•mica o ayudando en tareas de organizaci‚àö‚â•n, gesti‚àö‚â•n de redes, asesoramiento sanitario,... Estamos siempre disponibles a trav‚àö¬©s de nuestras redes para escuchar vuestras ideas sobre nuevas formas de aportar. Si  Por ‚àö‚à´ltimo, a‚àö¬±adir que si existiese alguien interesado en intentar replicar la iniciativa en otras ciudades, estaremos encantados de ayudar aportando toda la informaci‚àö‚â•n que hemos ido desarrollando en los ‚àö‚à´ltimos d‚àö‚â†as en lo que respecta a procesos, implementaci‚àö‚â•n, desarrollo,‚Äö√Ñ¬∂ de un proyecto de estas caracter‚àö‚â†sticas.  DONA Y COMPARTE PARA AYUDARNOS A ACABAR CON LA EPIDEMIA.  #YoMeQuedoEnCasa #YoAyudoDesdeCasa #FrenarLaCurva  Instagram: @Covid19_segovia

campaigns.title: Help For Baby Richie
campaigns.description: Hello, This is Richies story, he was born 7 weeks early. Mom went through California testing and everything seemed good with baby and no reason to worry besides a little fluid in his kidneys. Mom was monitored weekly and the issue seemed to be resolving itself.  When Richie was prematurely born, they told us the issue was still there along with 3 other defects. Since our baby had so many issues all together at once, they called in a geneticist and took blood samples. We were interrogated and asked a series of questions, after 3 weeks of emotional torture finally they had a result for us. The doctors said Richie has a very rare syndrome with only 300 cases reported in the world. By definition individuals with this rare syndrome have difficulty eating, so automatically all efforts to teach my premature baby to eat by the nurses were diminished. They put a tube in his nose and my son was barely given a chance. Doctors insisted that we would have to leave the NICU with a Gtube in order to successfully feed Richie.  After weeks of arguing with rude nurses and being there for our son, we proved to them that he didn‚Äö√Ñ√¥t need a tube in his stomach. We spent 7 weeks in an understaffed hospital with no bedside manner and gossipy nurses. They fed my baby cold breast milk and they also relied heavily on sugar water packets to calm down babies. It was a horrible experience and now my baby is suffering from all of it on top of the syndrome. He was repeatedly pricked on the hands and feet, he was around nurses and doctors who lost hope in him but he will prevail.  I know Richie will move mountains and I will help him along the way. I want to be able to get Richie the best help possible but my insurance unfortunately does not cover the physical therapy my son requires for his age along with other services he needs. We visit several specialists, he has started treatment for his surgery, we have several copays and medications and as much as I would like to be able to cover this myself it has become a little bit hard. We need help for Richies pediatric therapies and surgery but above all we need your prayers for our little boy. Thank you for time and support, any help we receive is greatly appreciated.

The Paddock on Market is committed to Doing Everything Possible to Keep Our Staff Members Compensated During Our Socially Responsible Governor Wolf Mandated Closure.   This is Easier Said than Done. While the Hospitality Industry is Financially Sound During Typical Times, We and They Do Not have the Deep Cash-Reserves to Absorb the Economic Impacts of this COVID-19 Pandemic. Our Industry Works on Cash Flow.... ¬¨‚Ä†When The Flow Stops Coming In Life as We Know it Ceases to Exist. ¬¨‚Ä†Please Help Keep Our Paddock on Market Family Compensated During this Mandated COVID-19 Closure.   Please Use the GOFUNDME Contribution Link to Our Paddock on Market Family Sustainability Fund. Your Generous Support Helps Our Staff Remain at The Ready to Reopen and Serve Our Blessed Community in Short Suspense.   Sally, Jonathan, and The Entire Staff of The Paddock on Market Thank You for Your Continued Outpouring of Love and Support. campaigns.title: Micro-Tech Endoscopy For Wuhan Coronavirus Relief
campaigns.description: Dear colleagues,  I would like to start a donation program to purchase some basic supplies for medical staff in China fighting the corona virus.¬¨‚Ä†  ¬¨‚Ä†You may be well aware of the situation from the news that there are now over 6,000 confirmed cases and 132 deaths from the highly contagious corona virus.¬¨‚Ä† The government and entire China are working hard to contain the spread.¬¨‚Ä† Public transportations in the city of Wuhan and quite a few surrounding cities in Hubei have been shut down and personnel in and out of the cities are closely controlled.¬¨‚Ä† Tens of thousands of physician and nurse volunteers from all over the country have gone to Wuhan to help including some doctors working closely with us in pulmonary medicine.¬¨‚Ä† One of them, Dr. Guangfa Wang from Beijing, actually got infected through his eyes in early January when he didn‚Äö√Ñ√¥t wear goggles and the virus wasn‚Äö√Ñ√¥t known to be contagious through the air at the time.¬¨‚Ä† He has since recovered.¬¨‚Ä† Many hospitals in China, especially in Wuhan and surrounding cities are in short supply of the basic protective gear (gowns, goggles and face masks) because of the surge in the suspected cases flooding into the hospitals.¬¨‚Ä†   With the help from Seana and Jiefeng, we have been able to locate some supplies (cost around $37K) that we will order and send over to China.¬¨‚Ä† I would like to ask everyone to help.¬¨‚Ä† The goal for the donation is $10K and  the company will match $2 for every $1 collected .¬¨‚Ä† Thank you all for your attention!   Chris Li President of Micro-Tech Endoscopy USA

campaigns.title: ONeills Bar - Corona Virus Spain
campaigns.description: I have successfully ran a local business here in Spain for the last seven years. I would love to continue offering our international cuisine to both the local community, friends, family   visitors from around the world. However, I am financially struggling like all small businesses, to pay our rent and taxes, for how long I can continue to carry on in this dire situation I am extremely uncertain and worried.  Today we have just been informed our Lockdown will be extended past the original 15 day deadline, we have no idea when this will end‚Äö√Ñ¬∂.  When we beat Corona Virus, and we will beat it together, life will continue but not as before, in a way we would never have imagined. Life for everyone has been turned upside down, with the loss of loved ones all our pain will carry on for a long time ahead of us.   Therefore, if any of you are able to financially contribute in anyway in order to support us through this difficult situation we have found ourselves in we would be extremely grateful.  I am very much aware of the Local Hospitals, Police   Charities who are working tirelessly to support those who have been diagnosed with Corona Virus. Therefore we believe it is only right that 50% of donations go to them in recognition of their hard work in continuing to care and protect for all of us here in Spain at this uncertain time in the world.   Thank you for your time and support in advance. With much love and caring thoughts Troy O‚Äö√Ñ√¥Neill. Stay safe, hold your families tight.

campaigns.title: Helping Others During the Coronavirus Panic
campaigns.description: Want to join me in making a difference? I'm raising money to benefit Meals on Wheels America, and any donation will help make an impact. I will be matching all donations up to $2,500. Thanks in advance for thinking outside of your ""bubble"" and helping with whatever amount you can.  The mission of Meals on Wheels America is to empower local community programs to improve the health and quality of life of the seniors they serve so that no one is left hungry or isolated.   Meals on Wheels serves an incredibly vulnerable population and is often the primary lifeline delivering so much more than just a meal, especially in uncertain times. Across the country, local programs are monitoring the evolving COVID-19 situation, taking precautions to protect these high-risk individuals, and preparing for increased demand and new ways of delivering services.

campaigns.title: LSU Coronavirus Mask Protection Program
campaigns.description: LSU Students are coming together to raise money for masks to protect against the spread of the Coronavirus (COVID-19). The funds will go to buying masks that will be distributed to students on and off-campus.¬¨‚Ä†  We are fortunate to have a supplier who has agreed to sell the masks for 50 cents each ($5 donation protects 10 LSU Students). Our goal is to get 3000+ masks. This will give masks to at least 10% of the student body.  We are in need of funds immediately because the virus is spreading quickly around Louisiana.  Your gift means the world to us and we thank you for your support!¬¨‚Ä†  It is thanks to the constant support of people like yourself around the state, country, and world that LSU remains one of the best universities in the world! Geaux Tigers!

campaigns.title: La Piquette Corona

I know everyone and La Piquette in particular will appreciate it tremendously. La Piquette will be for ever grateful for your help!

campaigns.title: Staff of Standard and Stella's vs COVID-19
campaigns.description: This is very hard to do knowing that so many in our community are currently facing the same hardships and uncertainty that we currently are, but we are here to ask a favor on behalf of our amazing bartenders and door hosts of  The Standard Tavern  and  Stella's; A Cocktail Dive.   At 2:01am on Tuesday morning, a day that was supposed to be filled with Irish cheer and whiskey chasers, we closed the doors to our businesses for the foreseeable future. And while we have emptied our coolers, drained our taps and prepared ourselves for the long haul we still have a very major concern on our minds- the awesome staff of bartenders and door hosts at  The Standard Tavern  and  Stella's; A Cocktail Dive.    These are the same amazing people that have helped us raise funds for a countless number of charities and different families of our neighborhood and community. They man our grills, run chili cook offs and even shave your head for mustache roulette. They are the smiling faces that greet you after a long day and have your drink order halfway ready before you even find your favorite bar stool.¬¨‚Ä† They are a fantastic group and its for these people that we are asking for help today.   We are asking for any help to ease some of their burden of rent/bills and stress of not knowing what tomorrow may bring for them.¬¨‚Ä† We are asking to give them a little bit of peace of mind in a very dark time. All of the funds raised will be distributed between the bartenders and door hosts. If you are able to help, please do. If you aren't, we absolutely understand and we hope that you have everything that you need to get through this crazy time. Please reach out if you need anything. Stay in touch. When this is all over we hope to catch up with all of you over some whiskey. Until then, stay safe and stay well.¬¨‚Ä†  #TheStandardTavern #Stellas

campaigns.title: Helping Local Hospitals During COVID-19
campaigns.description: The medical staff at hospitals are at the most risk right now by holding the front line for all of us. They should not be reusing their masks or making their own protection gears!¬¨‚Ä†  While we are social distancing ourselves and staying at home, these heroes put their lives to fight for us and they are running out of supplies. They are running out of things to protect them so they can protect us. And we need to help them.  I have reached out to multiple suppliers for normal surgical masks and N95 masks. Let's all contribute and buy them in bulk so we can send out to local hospitals that are in need! Anything will help!  Currently I am searching local news and reaching out hospitals by phone to see if they are in need of these masks. If you work at a hospital and would like to request some masks, please fill out this google form and we will be in touch shortly! We deeply appreciate the efforts of everyone within the health care community.   https://forms.gle/V9eRghGXEZm8Ub3A9     I have also created a spreadsheet to record all the transactions so everything is transparent.   https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Liu8d1Dk0ZAksCr6y4j2o7F1jWR1uSe0PZagWMpRQJg/edit?usp=sharing

campaigns.title: COVID-19 2020 Event Relief
campaigns.description: Each year, the United States Ski and Snowboard Hall of Fame depends heavily on revenue received from its annual Induction Ceremony   Gala. The event typically brings in over HALF THE ANNUAL OPERATING REVENUE required for the organizations budget.   This years event scheduled for March 28th in Sun Valley, Idaho has been postponed due to COVID-19. While we look to other funding sources like state and local government relief, it does not look like we will be successful in those efforts due to the nature of this pandemic and the other worthy organizations applying for those same dollars. campaigns.title: COVID-19 SOSTENIAMO TERAPIA INTENSIVA DI TRIESTE
campaigns.description: In questi giorni difficili,  l'Ospedale Cattinara di Trieste  sta sostenendo l'arrivo di persone malate provenienti non solo dalla regione Friuli Venezia Giulia, ma anche da altre regioni Italiane come la Lombardia, il Veneto ed altre pi‚àöœÄ distanti, forse anche la Vostra da nord a sud.  I casi che necessitano di cure stanno aumentando ed il personale sanitario ha bisogno del nostro supporto concreto. Di tutti noi indipendentemente da dove¬¨‚Ä† abbiate la residenza. Non c'‚àö¬Æ differenza siamo tutti abitanti di questa penisola unica al mondo.    In questo momento , le attrezzature necessarie per la terapia intensiva e subintensiva sono:  - Ventilatori - Dispositivi di ventilazione non invasiva - Monitoraggio emodinamico - Monitor - Materiale di consumo o altro materiale sanitario  Anche una piccola donazione pu‚àö‚â§ fare la differenza.   I fondi raccolti  saranno direttamente devoluti all‚Äö√Ñ√¥Ospedale di Cattinara Trieste o ridistribuiti¬¨‚Ä† sul territorio regionale (ulteriori 3 Ospedali) dalla  Azienda sanitaria universitaria Giuliano Isontina (ASU GI)   Mi chiamo Andrea Odoni, vivo a Trieste e sono laureato in Scienze Motorie (facolt‚àö‚Ä† di medicina) e sono uno dei promotori di questa campagna.¬¨‚Ä† Del mio team fa parte Diego Martone anche lui residente a Trieste.  Siamo in contatto con la Direzione dell'Ospedale di Cattinara citt‚àö‚Ä† di Trieste, Con L'universit‚àö‚Ä† di Trieste e con l'assessore alla sanit‚àö‚Ä† della regione Friuli .    ***************  PER CREDIBILITA' LASCIO SCAMBI DI MAIL CON LA DIREZIONE SANITARIA        In these difficult days, the Cattinara Hospital in Trieste is supporting the arrival of sick people not only from the Friuli Venezia Giulia region, but also from other Italian regions such as Lombardy, Veneto and others more distant, perhaps even yours from north to south.  Cases needing treatment are on the rise and healthcare professionals need our concrete support. Of all of us regardless of where you live. There is no difference we are all inhabitants of this unique peninsula in the world.  At this time, the necessary equipment for intensive and subintensive therapy are:  - Fans - Non invasive ventilation devices - Hemodynamic monitoring - Monitor - Consumables or other sanitary materials  Even a small donation can make a difference.  The funds raised will be directly donated to the Cattinara Trieste hospital or redistributed on the regional territory (additional 3 hospitals) by the Giuliano Isontina University Health Authority (ASU GI)  My name is Andrea Odoni, I live in Trieste and I have a degree in Sports Science (medical faculty) and I am one of the promoters of this campaign. Diego Martone is also part of my team and he also lives in Trieste. We are in contact with the Management of the Cattinara Hospital, city of Trieste, with the University of Trieste and with the councilor for health of the Friuli region.

campaigns.title: Marta Corona
campaigns.description: En septiembre de 2018 diagnosticar‚àö‚â•n a mi mam‚àö¬∞ con Cancer de H‚àö‚â†gado y Pancre‚àö¬∞s iniciando su primer tratamiento de quimioterapia el 26 de diciembre de 2018 el c‚àö‚à´al consisti‚àö‚â• de tres d‚àö‚â†as de tratamiento. Desp‚àö‚à´es de 9 meses y 12 tratamientos nos dan la mala noticia que el cancer se acostumbr‚àö‚â• al medicamento y el resultado fue que no hab‚àö‚â†a surtido ning‚àö‚à´n efecto causando que el cancer se esparciera a su costilla. ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†  ¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä† Desp‚àö‚à´es,¬¨‚Ä† empez‚àö‚â• con los tratamientos de radiaci‚àö‚â•n por 2 semanas causando que su h‚àö‚â†gado y pancre‚àö¬∞s se inflamaran y que a su vez el cancer se esparciera hacia su matriz y pulmones. A‚àö‚à´n con este diagnostico mi madre es una guerrera y quiere seguir luchando; esta semana estaremos llev‚àö¬∞ndola a el hospital MD Anderson en la ciudad de Houston, Texas; en donde estan los mejores doctores especializados en cancer. ¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä† Los costos de los tratamientos han sido muy altos y el costo de ir a Houston es a‚àö‚à´n m‚àö¬∞s, es por eso que pedimos ayuda con lo que ustedes nos puedan ayudar a seguir luchando por la vida de mi mam‚àö¬∞.¬¨‚Ä† De antemano gracias a todos, sabemos que Dios est‚àö¬∞ con ella y creyendo lo que no vemos como si fuese sanidad total sobre su cuerpo.¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†  ¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä† Bendiciones,¬¨‚Ä† Familia Corona.   ¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä† In September 2019 my mom got diagnosed with Liver and Pancreas Cancer. Her first Chemo began December 26, 2018 consisting in 3 days of treatment.¬¨‚Ä† After 9 months and 12 treatments the Doctor gives us the bad news that the cancer became accustomed to the treatment and it had no positive effect, causing the cancer to spread to her rib. After that she begins with radiation for 2 weeks causing her liver and pancreas to become inflamed, furthermore spreading to her uterus and her lungs. Even though she‚Äö√Ñ√¥s had bad diagnostics, my mom is a warrior and she really wants to keep fighting. This week we will be taking my mom to MD Anderson Hospital in Houston, Tx where they have the best cancer doctors. The cost of the treatments have been high and the cost to go to Houston will be even higher, which is why I‚Äö√Ñ√¥m asking for help. Any help you can give to my mom to¬¨‚Ä† keep on fighting. Thank you, beforehand!! We know that God is with her ‚Äö√Ñ√∫the God who gives life to the dead and calls into being things that were not.‚Äö√Ñ√π Blessings, Corona Family

campaigns.title: Abbiamo bisogno della tua protezione!
campaigns.description: Raccolta fondi a sostegno della Croce Rossa di Firenze   Per sostenere le attivit‚àö‚Ä† di contrasto e contenimento dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥ Emergenza Covid-19    In questo momento di emergenza, il lavoro della Croce Rossa ‚àö¬Æ molto intenso e concentrato su pi‚àöœÄ fronti: sanitario, sociale, di protezione civile. Questo impegno ‚àö¬Æ reso pi‚àöœÄ arduo per le difficolt‚àö‚Ä† nel reperire i DPI, ovvero le protezioni necessarie per poter consentire ai volontari di operare in sicurezza, che per essere efficaci devono inoltre essere sostituiti ad ogni uso.    La Croce Rossa di Firenze ‚àö¬Æ un‚Äö√Ñ√¥associazione di volontariato priva di finanziamenti esterni e fonda il suo sostentamento sull‚Äö√Ñ√¥impegno dei volontari e sulle donazioni. In questa situazione critica, l‚Äö√Ñ√¥aiuto da parte dei cittadini sar‚àö‚Ä† fondamentale per poter consentire ai volontari di proseguire tutte le attivit‚àö‚Ä† in supporto della popolazione in totale sicurezza.   ¬¨‚Ä†‚àö√† stata avviata una raccolta fondi straordinaria, rivolta alle attivit‚àö‚Ä† connesse all‚Äö√Ñ√¥emergenza COVID-19 con le seguenti finalit‚àö‚Ä†: - Acquisto di DPI, quali mascherine FFP2 e FFP3, tute, occhiali protettivi, calzari, ecc. per la  protezione del personale impegnato  nelle attivit‚àö‚Ä† di soccorso, trasporto infermi, assistenza sanitaria domiciliare; -  Supporto e implementazione  del servizio ""CRI per Te"" finalizzato alla  consegna domiciliare di generi alimentari e farmaci  per persone anziane ed immunodepresse; -  Supporto  al progetto ""Volontari temporanei"" per la  formazione a distanza di volontari  da impiegare nei servizi accessori e sussidiari legati all'emergenza COVID-19.   L'intera somma raccolta sar‚àö‚Ä† impiegata direttamente per le attivit‚àö‚Ä† sopra elencate.

campaigns.title: COVID-19 Frontline Community Fundraiser
campaigns.description: Our Mission: Raise Money for PPE / Frontline Supplies / Sewing Materials (Fabric   Filters)  As you may know, supplies for healthcare workers at this time are unbelievably scarce, putting our frontline workers and their patients in danger of falling ill, passing along symptoms and creating the risk of being unable to staff the hospital during this public health crisis.  Currently, local hospitals are in dire need of supplies. Over the past week, frontline workers have been directed to buy and make their own protective gear -- bandanas as face masks, ski goggles as protective eyewear, and rags and towels instead of sanitizing wipes. Healthcare workers are scrambling to get PPE (N-95 masks, surgical masks, face shields, gloves, surgical scrub caps, etc) in every and any way possible.¬¨‚Ä†  We have started a community fundraiser to help in order to help frontline workers procure PPE as well as materials for alternative protection measures, and we are asking for your financial help in this time.¬¨‚Ä†   If you have supplies to donate:¬¨‚Ä†  Please consider donating supplies. Anything that is not being used currently at (your place of business, school, worship, construction site, brewery, etc) could be helpful and greatly increase the level of care these hospital workers can provide. In order for this to be effective, we need a large community effort, immediately.    What do we need?  We are asking specifically for items including but not limited to: N95 respirators, surgical masks, disposable gloves, face shields, goggles, shower caps, cleaning supplies, canisters of disinfectant wipe, cleaning rags, hand sanitizer, etc‚Äö√Ñ¬∂.  Be creative. There are no limits, as the hospitals need all the help they can get and it is our citizen responsibility to help protect them.¬¨‚Ä†  If you have supplies or questions please send me a message through the GoFundMe platform and I will get back to you.¬¨‚Ä†  Thank you all in advance!

campaigns.title: fight coronavirus with medical protection and food
campaigns.description: Whenever there are outbreaks of respiratory illnesses, one of the first things you see is more people wearing face masks. As more coronavirus cases are reported, demand for face masks will increase ‚Äö√Ñ√Æ as will their prices there's already been some serious price  Authorities cut most transport links to the central Chinese city last week to try to halt the spread of the flu-like virus. Thousands of cases have been reported in China, with a small number in countries including the United States, Thailand and Singapore.  The unprecedented move prompted people in the city of 11 million to rush to supermarkets to stock up on instant noodles, vegetables and whatever else they could put their hands on.  Residents say there has yet to be an acute shortage of food, although shelves are cleared quickly when goods arrive.  Shouguang, the country‚Äö√Ñ√¥s biggest vegetable production base, in the eastern Shandong province, has been asked to deliver 600 tons of fresh vegetables to Wuhan every day in the next 10 to 15 days, said an official in Sunjiaji, one of Shouguang‚Äö√Ñ√¥s villages.  Sunjiaji, whose main crop is cucumbers, was tasked with sending 60 tons in less than seven hours.  China‚Äö√Ñ√¥s largest food and agricultural firm COFCO Group and China Grain Reserves Corporation (Sinograin) Group have stepped up supplies of rice, meat and cooking oil to Hubei province  wuhan You need this kind of help to provide masks and food for the most needy

Magali displayed tremendous strength and courage during her ordeal and inspired us all. She spent her last few moments with those she loved and was at peace with herself. Her friends and family are asking for your help to cover Magali's funeral expenses(her celebration of life, as requested by Magali), any amount will be greatly appreciateda.¬¨‚Ä† Thank you.

campaigns.title: PPE for MIA Resident Physicians fighting COVID-19
campaigns.description: Our world has been rattled by the pandemic of COVID-19. As health care workers our first priority is the safety of the community. To provide this care we need to protect ourselves and you all through the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) to curtail the spread of this virus .  ¬¨‚Ä†We are a group of resident physicians at Jackson Memorial Hospital, a public trust hospital for Miami-Dade County and the 3rd largest hospital in the United States. We, along with other health professionals, are at the front lines of the COVID-19 epidemic working tirelessly to provide the best care we can to our patients; this is our honor and our oath.   Currently, one of the biggest concerns is the diminishing quantities of personal protective equipment (PPE), including N95 masks, gowns, gloves, and face shields. Cases continue to increase exponentially, and PPE allows health care workers to limit the spread further ¬¨‚Ä†  As it stands, Miami-Dade has the highest amount of cases in the state of Florida and the predicted trajectory is only upwards in the coming weeks. With a lack of protective gear, we not only put the health of Miami in jeopardy, we also put ourselves in danger of not being able to serve our community due to transmission.¬¨‚Ä†  We are fundraising to get the PPE that is essential for us to maintain the workforce to treat our patients in a safe manner, prevent spread in hospitals, and provide safety for the community.¬¨‚Ä†  PPE costs approximately $40 per box. We recognize that this is a difficult and scary time for many people- economically, emotionally, and physically. We will not give up and we are committed to the health of Miami-Dade.  Our team appreciates any support, donation, or sharing of this message. Any help you can offer is greatly appreciated and will go a long way in helping us keep our community safe.   Please, please stay home if you can, utilize social distancing, stay safe, and wash those hands!  As we work as a community, This too shall pass.   ¬¨‚Ä†

We‚Äö√Ñ√¥re donating 50% because we‚Äö√Ñ√¥re better able by good fortune and have no excuse not to give.¬¨‚Ä†  100% of every penny that lands here to go exactly where is belongs through a proper charity (any audit welcome any time - period.)  Mainly...  Let‚Äö√Ñ√¥s show the country and world we understand how to help one another on such a scale! Please join.¬¨‚Ä†

campaigns.title: Heart of Travel: Keeping Lights on During COVID-19
campaigns.description: See our Youtube video  here ¬¨‚Ä†.¬¨‚Ä†  WHAT IS HEART OF TRAVEL?¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†    Heart of Travel ¬¨‚Ä† is a female-powered tour company that specializes in small group travel to Latin America. We founded our company with three major goals:  1. To make a difference in the way people view Latin American countries and their people.¬¨‚Ä†   2. To change up who is benefiting from tourism by putting more money into the hands of small businesses, artists, and artisans.¬¨‚Ä†  3. To reduce our negative impact on the environment when traveling.  ¬¨‚Ä†   HOW LONG HAS HEART BEEN AROUND?¬¨‚Ä†   Heart of Travel was founded in November of 2016 but we really got rolling as a company in July of 2017 when Ana ""Chiva"" Castillo, born and raised in Guatemala, came aboard as co-founder. Over the past three years, we‚Äö√Ñ√¥ve seen steady growth and increased success thanks to our amazing team and loyal supporters. In November of 2019, we were recognized by the Guatemalan Institute of Tourism as one of the top 7 small businesses with the greatest potential to make an impact on responsible and sustainable tourism.  At Heart of Travel, we‚Äö√Ñ√¥ve always been the underdogs and challenges are nothing new to us. From earthquakes to volcanic eruptions, a tense global political climate and a lack of funding opportunities for women and POC - we have always persevered and found a way to overcome any obstacle put in our path.   ¬¨‚Ä†   BUT NOW WE ARE IN TROUBLE AND NEED YOUR HELP!¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†   Nothing could have prepared us for COVID-19. In the past two weeks, our sales have dropped by 98% and emails to cancel and postpone trips have been flooding in. People are understandably scared and Heart of Travel is taking a very prudent stance of not promoting travel between now and August in order to help slow the spread of the virus and not put our employees, clients and freelance providers at risk. You can read our entire official statement regarding COVID-19 here:   https://www.facebook.com/theheartoftravel   We are determined to keep fighting but there is also no denying the numbers. Co-founders, Chelsea and Chiva, will be taking a 20% salary cut, with no reduction in hours, while other staff members have volunteered to take up to a 32% reduction in hours worked in order to lower operating costs in the coming months - a gesture that we greatly appreciate and that makes us that much more motivated to keep these wonderful people employed.¬¨‚Ä†  Even with strategies to cut costs, if we tap into savings and max out our modest credit line we can still only get through 2 months with little to no sales before having to lay people off. We know the world will recover in the coming months from this global economic and health crisis but in order to keep the lights on and avoid layoffs in the meantime, we need your help!¬¨‚Ä†  ¬¨‚Ä†   HOW CAN YOU HELP HEART OF TRAVEL?¬¨‚Ä†   1. Sign up for a trip! Trips from August 2020 onwards are still available for registration and for all 2020 trips we‚Äö√Ñ√¥ve introduced a new more flexible refund policy. See trips currently available here:¬¨‚Ä†  www.heartoftravel.org/group-tours/  2. Write us a review on Tripadvisor so that when things pick back up we will get a rush of sales on day and weekend tours here in Guatemala!¬¨‚Ä† See our Tripadvisor page here:   https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g295366-d15188367-Reviews-Heart_of_Travel-Antigua_Sacatepequez_Department.html   3. Follow us on social media and share our website and social media accounts with your friends. We will be pumping out lots of fun and useful content in the coming months to build our social media following in hopes to grow our community and boost sales when people begin to travel again!¬¨‚Ä†   instagram: ¬¨‚Ä†@heart_of_travel¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†   facebook: ¬¨‚Ä†facebook.com/theheartoftravel¬¨‚Ä†   website: ¬¨‚Ä†www.heartoftravel.org¬¨‚Ä†  4. Donate to this crowdfunding effort! Even if you just donate a small portion of what you would have spent on travel this year you can help us stay afloat.   ¬¨‚Ä†   HOW WILL THE FUNDS BE USED?¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†   Funds will be used to cover payroll and office operational costs over the next four months in order to avoid layoffs as we continue designing new itineraries and planning future trips as well as creating more useful and interesting travel-related content for Instagram, Facebook, Pinterest and the Heart of Travel blog!   But this doesn‚Äö√Ñ√¥t just affect us here at Heart! The entire tourism community is in crisis and there are many small businesses, freelance guides, artists and artisans who rely on Heart of Travel for a portion of their income. Therefore, a portion of all funds raised will be utilized for a mini ‚Äö√Ñ√∫stimulus‚Äö√Ñ√π program where we will donate the equivalent of the average monthly income generated via Hearts tours to the freelancers and artisans who we work with on a regular basis to help soften the blow.¬¨‚Ä†  ¬¨‚Ä†   YOU HAVE THE POWER TO KEEP HEART AND OUR EXTENDED FAMILY AFLOAT DURING THIS UNPRECEDENTS PANDEMIC!¬¨‚Ä†   From the bottom of our hearts, thank you so all so much! Please stay safe and healthy and remember to stay grounded and grateful during these crazy times.   ¬¨‚Ä†  With love and gratitude,¬¨‚Ä†  Chelsea Glass   Ana Castillo

campaigns.title: BE CHAMPION  against COVID 19
campaigns.description: I  Campioni del mondo 2006  scendono di nuovo in campo per raccogliere fondi da destinare alla  Croce Rossa Italiana ¬¨‚Ä† e aiutare il nostro Paese in emergenza Coronavirus.   Fai parte anche tu della nostra squadra.    Uniti vinceremo ancora!   #ITALIAWC2006 ¬¨‚Ä†#UnItaliaCheAiuta       CROCE ROSSA ITALIA - Emergenza CORONAVIRUS        La  Croce Rossa Italiana  ¬¨‚Ä†‚àö¬Æ in prima linea fin dai primi momenti in modo capillare su tutto il territorio nazionale attraverso le migliaia di volontari e volontarie che si stanno impegnando a trasformare questo momento critico nel ‚Äö√Ñ√∫Tempo della Gentilezza‚Äö√Ñ√π, cos‚àö¬® che al di l‚àö‚Ä† dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥intervento in emergenza, possiamo trovare il modo di essere sempre accanto ai pi‚àöœÄ fragili.  La Croce Rossa Italiana, seduta al tavolo tecnico del Comitato Operativo della Protezione Civile, sta intervenendo con i suoi mezzi, i volontari e il suo staff preparato per garantire il trasporto di emergenza, in alto-biocontenimento e in sicurezza dei potenziali malati. Il Tempo della gentilezza per‚àö‚â§ ‚àö¬Æ anche quello in cui vengono attivati e potenziati i servizi per i pi‚àöœÄ vulnerabili come ‚Äö√Ñ√∫CRI Per Te‚Äö√Ñ√π che garantisce la consegna della spesa e dei farmaci a domicilio per anziani, persone fragili e coloro che altrimenti rischierebbero l‚Äö√Ñ√¥isolamento.  Anche grazie alle risorse gentilmente donate, l‚Äö√Ñ√¥impegno della  Croce Rossa  continua e si amplia, investendo su servizi, mezzi e formazione per volontari e operatori per essere al fianco di chi pi‚àöœÄ ne ha bisogno.  Insieme supereremo questo momento cos‚àö¬® difficile, insieme siamo #UnItaliaCheAiuta

campaigns.title: Samaritan, an app to defeat COVID-19
campaigns.description: ( CLICK HERE TO VISIT SAMARITAN'S LAUNCH PAGE! ¬¨‚Ä†)  This is me and my 88 y.o. grandparents who emigrated from the Soviet Union so my family could live insurmountably better lives. My grandma was the one who taught me to see the good in everything and the kindness in peoples' hearts. My grandpa was the one who taught me to use my imagination and build things for my neighbors to relish. Needless to say,  I love them to death . And with the onset of the COVID-19 epidemic and the American government's incredibly slow response system, for my babushka and dedushka,  I am now scared to death .      What is Samaritan?   I was calling my grandparents one day, urging them to wash their hands whenever they came home from running errands, when I thought of  Samaritan . I knew there are millions of people in need who don't have caretakers or loved ones to readily provide them with necessities, and with this came the idea for an app that  connects those in need with samaritans willing to help .  Samaritan will be a completely free, ad-less platform for those in need, or Receivers, to be aided by samaritans in their areas. The latter will bring food, packages, and other supplies to those who are quarantined, out of the goodness of their hearts.    ¬¨‚Ä†  What about Evil People?   In other words, what will happen if people misuse the platform to acquire goods and services? I completely acknowledge the security risks that come with this completely free platform, and am implementing the following to mitigate misuse:  - Samaritan and Receiver  rating system  - Login through  verified accounts  (Facebook and Google) -  (Future)   Background checks  with Passport Photos/Driver's Licences  That being said, there will still be numerous ways for people to use the platform for the wrong reasons. I implore early users to  flag suspicious accounts  and to  call Receivers on the phone prior to exchanges  to ensure the safety of both parties.   How to deal with community spread through this app?   Samaritans will be  onboarded with procedures on avoiding direct contact  with Receivers, as well as  best practices  for navigating the streets during times of quarantine. Extra security measures will also be put in place to  ensure the COVID-19-negative-status of  Samaritans. Of course, the app and its creators  will not be liable for accidental spread , but we urge users to use this platform for the greater good.   What if this flops?   If there really is no kindness left in the world amidst this pandemic, I pledge to  donate all remaining funds  from this GoFundMe campaign to the  American Red Cross .

campaigns.title: Kuya Ja's COVID-19 Employee Relief Fund
campaigns.description: We had worked so hard to get this place open and could not have done it without the support of all of our amazing customers, the following from our pop up days, and our staff. We have made the difficult decision to close our doors effective Sunday, March 22nd. It was a really hard decision to make. Being in the service industry, we pride ourselves on serving the community and giving them what they want and need. However, we cannot allow our staff to risk exposure to COVID-19. We cannot allow ourselves to risk getting our families sick. We have a 6 year old daughter and a 2 year old daughter, as well as parents with pre-existing health conditions. We cannot afford to risk their lives staying open. We know that we will reopen again, but we cannot do that without a completely healthy team. We don‚Äö√Ñ√¥t know when we will reopen.   Operating on margins as thin as ours, this means that our employees don‚Äö√Ñ√¥t know when they will get their next checks. We are starting this fund to help support all of our employees. All of the money collected will go to staff and will not be used for the restaurant or the owners benefit. We understand that it is a hard time for everyone but if you have anything to spare, no amount is too small. It breaks our hearts that our staff have to figure out how to pay for their rent, utilities, groceries, etc. and many of them have children to support as well.   Please, if you haven‚Äö√Ñ√¥t already, reach out to your local congressmen and state government. Restaurants are in dire need of help. #toosmalltofail   We appreciate all of the love we have received thus far. Thank you for making our dreams reality and supporting our small mom and pop. It's not goodbye, it‚Äö√Ñ√¥s see you later.  With love, Chef Javier Fernandez and Jennifer Fernandez, Owners

campaigns.title: Twins and Tony Corona Virus Relief

You've always been great to us behind the bar, but a ""tip"" now goes a long way. It'd be the more important and memorable one you've ever given us.¬¨‚Ä†  We are in good spirits right now and still in a place where we're okay for the time being. But along with 100's of thousands of industry workers in this city, the times ahead are going to be tough and we wanted to reach out now before it becomes a dire situation.  Also open to part-time work in sales, management and odd jobs.  Thanks for anything anyone can do and hopefully we'll be back to business as usual sooner than later.  -Brittany, Whittany and Tony

campaigns.title: Antiseptics for hospitals in Wuhan
campaigns.description: Our goal (‚Ä∞‚àè‚â†√ä√±√°√Å√¢√†√Ç√∫¬Æ‚Ä∞‚àè√£√ä√±œÄ):¬¨‚Ä†  With the situation around the Coronavirus worsening daily, the demand for safety supplies such as hand sanitizers and rubbing alcohol are increasing as you are reading this.¬¨‚Ä† Every day more than a thousand people are diagnosed with the Coronavirus worldwide. Attached is a video, a story of a doctor leaving his family to fight the Coronavirus. We are just a group of students from boarding schools in the U.S., and we are trying to help the situation at home.¬¨‚Ä† We are becoming more and more concerned about the safety and well-being of our loved ones who are still in China.¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†  With your help, we hope to assist the process of developing a cure through purchasing antiseptics for hospitals in the epicenter of the Coronavirus.¬¨‚Ä† We have already successfully reached out to a factory in Shandong province that manufactures antiseptics, around 600 miles North East of Wuhan, who is willing to manufacture extra antiseptics for the hospitals in Wuhan.  We assure you that all of your kind donations will go to the purchase of gallons of hand antiseptics crucial to the medical staff who are battling the Coronavirus on the front line.¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä†  Your kind donation will mean a lot to us, our family members, and those who are unfortunately under the grasp of the Coronavirus.¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†  For any more questions regarding the situation in Wuhan, please feel free to contact us, and we will do our best to answer you.¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†  Sincerely,¬¨‚Ä†  Alesia Zhou - Stevenson ‚Äö√Ñ√≤22¬¨‚Ä† Clark Dong - Hotchkiss ‚Äö√Ñ√≤22¬¨‚Ä† Jeff Shan - Stevenson ‚Äö√Ñ√≤23 Ethan Sun - Berkshire '23 Changyu Wang - Piedmont '20   Dr. Liu‚Äö√Ñ√¥s story:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IneFBNpi8MU   The outbreak of the n-CoV virus has already affected millions of people worldwide.¬¨‚Ä† In search of cures for the Coronavirus, doctors across China have volunteered to be on the front lines of the battle at the epicenter of this plague. In the video we have attached, a forty-four-year-old veteran doctor from the SARS outbreak nearly two decades ago, The Wenchuan Earthquake, The Yushu Earthquake, once-again, left his family in Xi‚Äö√Ñ√¥an to battle another deadly virus.¬¨‚Ä†  The camera crew of South China Morning Post recorded the last breakfast and goodbye shared between the doctor and his wife before he enters the war zone.¬¨‚Ä† In the video, the horror in her eyes are visible, and the fear in her voice is audible. She has already done everything she can to prepare her husband for his journey, but she can only do so much.  We also accept donation through Wechat Pay (QR Code pasted at the end of the story) Thank you very much for your support!  √ä√†√´‚Ä∞¬™¬®√Å√∂√ë√Å√µ√Ü√ä‚Ä†√°√î¬∫√∂ campaigns.title: Covid-19 Coronavirus HELP FOR THE ELDERLY , DERBY
campaigns.description: Hello All,   I've been seeing and hearing alot of stories of the elderly and those with disabilities not willing to leave their home so get basic essentials to survive.  In light of this, i'm starting this fundraiser. The money will be used to help these in our local community purchase the basic essentials. Things we all take for granted like bread, milk, frozen, tea, sugar, shower products.¬¨‚Ä†  Our elderly, our parents, grand parents, friends   family are all at risk if they're over the age of 60. Most of these will not leave the house because they're scared for their own health. As a community, we should pull together and do what we can to help these people.  I will be looking at local volunteers to help drive essentials to various addresses around Derby. Part of the funds will be used to cover Fuel Costs, the remaining funds will be used to help give our most vulnerable the essentials they so desperately need.   Breakdown of what the money will be used for:  Basic Essentials: Cleaning Products, Bread, Milk, Tea/Coffee, Shower Products, Meals. Collections for the Elderly e.g. Basic pain killers Taxi's where appropriate for delivery of items where no one is available to volunteer. Fuel Costs  Every penny counts and every penny will be used. It's times like this where we must pull together as a community and help each other. You never know when it could be you or i in this situation needing help.

campaigns.title: Bangladesh - You are not alone
campaigns.description: What   Bangladesh  is facing an unprecedented crisis as Coronavirus (Covid-19) is making its footprint. Normally known for a¬¨‚Ä† hustling-bustling country that we so dearly cherish, the nation's regular life is halted in many aspects and impacting wider population significantly. The underprivileged - a signification portion of the population caught up in this unwanted catastrophe - are battling to make ends meet.    Who  All hand-to-mouth wage earners - from Rickshaw puller to Nut seller, from Hawker to Day Labour, from Homeless to Maids, all are facing a grim reality of hunger as their income is rapidly dwindling due to less demand of their services. In addition, the hoarding disorder of rich few pushed the price of essential items unreachable for poor many.  This is our little effort to fight this calamity by offering a helping hand to those who have nowhere else go.   How  The plan is to deploy volunteers to locate the most vulnerable ones across Dhaka city. They will then help those poor ones getting the essentials to go on for few days - e.g. rice, lentils, potatoes, onion etc. No cash will be given out.¬¨‚Ä† The volunteers will ensure their own safety before engaging with people.   Accepted Currencies:   Euro ¬¨‚Ä† - directly on this page  or  IBAN - BE 72 3771 1231 4216 (S Mahmud)  BDT  - Please contact for B-Kash account details  USD, GBP, AUD, NZD  - Please contact for bank account number. All other currencies - Please ask.   Transparency  To ensure transparency for legal and moral compliance, all incoming and outgoing will be recorded and shared as/when required. We expect to receive donations outside this platform. Therefore, we will keep a publicly visible list to recognise all contribution. No personal information will be shared.¬¨‚Ä†¬¨‚Ä†  This noble cause will be centrally managed from  Belgium . If you would like to get involved, please let us know.¬¨‚Ä†  Let's spread the word. If our help bring food on someone's plate, then it's worth the fight.¬¨‚Ä†  ********************  Thank you will be an understatement but still - Thank You. May Allah have mercy on us.¬¨‚Ä†   Contact us  Shoyeb: +32 471 99 45 70¬¨‚Ä† Salama : +32 486 44 41 36 / +880¬¨‚Ä† 17 1689 7632 (Whatsapp/Viber)  westandbybd@gmail.com ¬¨‚Ä†     Photo taken on 20-March-2020. Will try to get a better photo soon.

campaigns.title: COVID-19 Support for Brandy Library Family
campaigns.description: As many people are reeling from the effects of COVID-19, perhaps no industry has been hit harder than the service industry. Like many small businesses within the service industry, our employees collect tips, which are the primary source of their livelihoods. Being forced to close due to the current crisis has put a significant drain on their cash flow. As a company, we are working hard to find ways to continue to support our team and to ensure we can return to full strength just as soon as the 'all clear' has been given. Please help the family of Brandy Library by simply pledging what you would normally tip during a stay with your favorite bartender, sommelier, server, etc. All gifts collected will go directly to our hourly employees to offset their lost wages. We appreciate your generosity and look forward to seeing you in our beautiful lounge of amber spirits very soon!

campaigns.title: Help us! Face masks for old people against corona
campaigns.description: Hi Everybody!  The World is in hard situation and we should help each other. This virus is the most dangerous for older people. Many of them doesnt know how to protect themselves. One of the things that can help is wearing of FACE MASKS.  Face Masks arent available in most of the shops. So we decided for manufacture. Please help us to buy material.¬¨‚Ä†  Face masks will be for OLD people and they get it for FREE.  Together we can win this fight!  Thank you! :)

campaigns.title: Mike & Nik Majic Corona Virus Relief Fund/Aid
campaigns.description: Please donate to help Marinko jr and Nik recover from a horrible COVID-19 . After a terrible incident sharing a TRULY Hard Seltzer black cherry malt beverage, they have both fallen ill and need your help. Donate Today

campaigns.title: Corona Quarantine Cant Work, 2 months for Bills
campaigns.description: Im a full time Lyft/Uber Driver,¬¨‚Ä† Due to Covid-19 im unable to work and will be unable to pay my bills. (Rent, Car, Insurance) etc. Not only am i unable to work,¬¨‚Ä† but Ridesharing is not considered Employment so there is no Workers Comp or Unemployment that can be filled. I would like to ask anyone who can help to please help. Any and everything can help, even sharing this message.¬¨‚Ä† Thank you in advance, Peace and stay safe, God Help Us All.

campaigns.title: Save Jen's Business Amid Covid-19
campaigns.description: Our dear friend Jen's catering business has been severely affected by the Covid-19 outbreak in Seattle. As the epicenter in the US for the virus, all of Jen's catering jobs have been canceled or postponed resulting in severe financial hardship for her and her kids. Jen started the Salted Fig 3 years ago with the goal of providing high quality, affordable meals to individuals and groups.   As soon as the virus hit, clients immediately started canceling - first catering and then her personal chef clients. Seattle has so far been the city hardest hit by the COVID-19 coronavirus. This scary and tragic time has a lot of people staying close to home in order to try to help prevent the spread of this virus that can be devastating to our elderly, disabled, and medically compromised friends and neighbors.   The widespread cancellation of group events has had a disproportionate impact on small businesses - especially those who are in the service industry. Jen's very existence relies on what she creates and having regular clients to rely on. As a woman-owned, small business Jen does not have the ability to take sustain such severe hardship. If you love Seattle and have the resources to help - please consider donating. Every little bit helps.

campaigns.title: Fighting COVID-19 together

The money will go to buy medical and paramedical equipment (respiratory machines, COVID-19 test kits, masks, gown/coveralls, medical goggles, face shield, etc.).  Thank you for your contribution!

campaigns.title: Support Aulder/ZPM Residents During COVID-19
campaigns.description: Aulder Family and Friends,  Over the past several weeks, COVID - 19 has had a dramatic impact on the livelihood of millions of families across the world.  The disease has not only put many of our residents at medical risk, but it has also had a substantial economic impact on their day to day lives.  In all of the communities where we own real estate, schools have been closed for the foreseeable future putting meal distribution programs to children at risk. Local government and school districts are working with organizations to provide food and set up distance learning, but this is a huge undertaking as hundreds of families struggle with the immediate impacts including loss of jobs, food security, and child care and schools.¬¨‚Ä† As community partners, we want to support the ongoing efforts to provide for our residents while long term plans are made and put into action.  The Aulder/ZPM Social Impact Committee and our employees on-site have been able to provide ¬¨‚Ä† $2,800 worth of food   to supplement the lost breakfast and lunches and   $700 worth of activity books and crayons   to keep the kids busy while learning plans are drawn up .   Many residents have accepted the gifts with tears in their eyes, one such resident said,   "" Thanks to the employees, I did not have to search for lunch for the great grand kids today. Thank you, thank you""  . We hope to continue supporting our residents and do everything in our power to mitigate the impact which this pandemic is having on the health and wellness of our communities.¬¨‚Ä†   But now, we are reaching out for your help to allow us to continue providing for our residents while the long term plans are implemented and especially ensuring the most vulnerable during this time (children and elderly) are being supported.¬¨‚Ä†   Please see below for a detailed description of how we plan on using the funds:   1) Distribution of healthy food to residents (including snacks, breakfast and lunch)   Specific food delivery and pick up times will be announced on a weekly basis, and all food will be distributed in a responsible manner.   2) Elderly resident check in / resource support   We plan on calling each of our elderly residents and asking them if they need any assistance or have specific goods or services which they need. Our onsite team will use resources available to provide the proper support.¬¨‚Ä†  If you are interested in volunteering to call residents, please fill out this interest form:¬¨‚Ä†  Link to Volunteer ¬¨‚Ä†    3) Educational activities to be distributed to children (activity books, reading books, brain games, arts and crafts materials, etc.).¬¨‚Ä†   Many of our community‚Äö√Ñ√¥s children have little to do on a day to day basis - our goal is to provide them with educational activities which they can enjoy during this time of social distancing.¬¨‚Ä†   4) Supplement Technology / E Learning¬¨‚Ä†   The majority of schools have moved to an ‚Äö√Ñ√∫E - Learning‚Äö√Ñ√π platform but many of our residents do not have access to computers or tablets to participate. We hope to support these students with access to computers, tablets, and wifi to continue their studies in their homes.¬¨‚Ä†  More than half of American jobs are at risk, with limited income and the risk of food shortage, we want to assure we are doing everything we can to make a difference in our resident‚Äö√Ñ√¥s lives.   Every donation will be greatly appreciated.¬¨‚Ä†    Sincerely,  Michael Zito

campaigns.title: Covid-19 - Potenziamo la Terapia Intensiva Veneta
campaigns.description: Siamo il gruppo di supporto dell'Ulss Serenissima per l'Ospedale SS. Giovanni e Paolo a Venezia  (   https://www.aulss3.veneto.it/index.cfm?action=mys.page content_id=631   )  Ci battiamo per la creazione di nuovi posti letto utili a fronteggiare la crisi sanitaria nel reparto di terapia intensiva veneta.  Due giorni fa un uomo di ottant'anni ‚àö¬Æ deceduto:  (  https://nuovavenezia.gelocal.it/italia-mondo/cronaca/2020/03/10/news/la-figlia-di-un-ottantenne-morto-in-ospedale-mio-padre-senza-cure-in-terapia-intensiva-per-lui-non-c-era-posto-1.38573931   )   Poche ore prima del decesso ‚àö¬Æ stato trasferito all'ospedale di Crema nel vano tentativo di poterlo salvare, ma ‚àö¬Æ morto l‚àö¬®, in sala d'attesa, lontano dalla sua famiglia.     In un momento di emergenza come quella che stiamo affrontando oggi, medici, infermieri e personale ospedaliero stanno svolgendo tutto ci‚àö‚â§ che in loro potere.  Facciamo la nostra parte: aiutiamoli con un piccolo contributo. La donazione minima ‚àö¬Æ 5 ‚Äö√á¬®.¬¨‚Ä† Tutte le cifre sono importanti.   Vi terremo aggiornati momento per momento sulle donazioni e assieme al reparto di terapia intensiva, stabiliremo un piano specifico per l'allocazione TRASPARENTE dei fondi.  UNITI POSSIAMO FARCELA.  #VENEZIANONMOLLA

campaigns.title: Covid-19: aiutiamo la ricerca al Cotugno
campaigns.description: Questa raccolta ha lo scopo di raccogliere fondi per sostenere l‚Äö√Ñ√¥Ospedale Cotugno di Napoli e supportare la ricerca di un farmaco per la cura del virus Covid-19.  Dopo aver letto degli ottimi risultati raggiunti ¬¨‚Ä†dall‚Äö√Ñ√¥Opedale Cotugno in collaborazione con il Pascale grazie al farmaco sperimentale per la cura dei pazienti affetti dal coronavirus, non possiamo fare altro che aiutarli. Con la speranza di trovare anche un vaccino.  Noi siamo due ragazze che hanno deciso di cominciare questa raccolta ¬¨‚Ä†per raggiungere un obiettivo non facile ma possibile, grazie al contributo di ognuno di voi. Facciamolo per chi e‚Äö√Ñ√¥ in difficolta‚Äö√Ñ√¥ adesso e per coloro che lo saranno domani, in Italia e nel resto del mondo.  La raccolta e‚Äö√Ñ√¥ stata autorizzata dalla Direzione Generale dell‚Äö√Ñ√¥Ospedale dei Colli, che comprende il Cotugno.  Diamoci da fare, donate quanto potete,condividete quanto piu‚Äö√Ñ√¥ potete, insieme ce la faremo!  Carolina Sallustio Caterina Muto

campaigns.title: Food Shopping & Prep for COVID-19
campaigns.description: Hello Friends,  Jason   I want to help..he‚Äö√Ñ√¥s a chef by profession, but what really drew us to this industry was making people happy and nourished at the same time. Over the last 20 years, we‚Äö√Ñ√¥ve worked every position in the kitchen. I know the value of hard work and the determination it takes to persevere. I also appreciate the bonds we make as we all traverse our own path. For Jason, it's buying a new pair of shoes for a prep cook or giving his crew members a ride home after working a double. It's about COMMUNITY.... . . In these uncertain times amidst the COVID-19 outbreak, many of you are figuring out the best way to keep your family safe, especially those who have weakened immune systems or are more susceptible to becoming ill if confronted with the virus.... . . We want to offer aid   an option for you   your elderly neighbor or whomever. My fianc‚àö¬©e and I have nearly 35 years combined experience in the food service industry. We've managed and operated within some of the top restaurants that emphasize dietary and allergen certification processes¬¨‚Ä† and focus on sanitation training......and, of course, DELICIOUS food!!.... . . We are offering our private cooking services to all those in need, and here's why we're different:  1. We have access to an empty private kitchen - we will be the only ones preparing your food 2. We order our food from commercial food purveyors - no crowded grocery shopping or fear of running out of supplies 3. We offer fast and contactless delivery. 4. We can prepare recipes and meal prep so you can cook at home or we'll cook for you; daily and weekly planning available. Do you have extremely picky eaters? We'll even cook your tried and true family recipes!!! REPLY for more info and menu options.   ***This effort is donation based so we can help those in need. This is a not for profit endeavor, however we will use any excess donations to cover incidentals and basic living expenses, so that we can help as many people as possible and continue our efforts as long as there is a demand. ***   PLEASE FORWARD THIS IF YOU KNOW OF ANY ELDERLY OR HOME BOUND RESIDENTS THAT NEED HELP!  Peace + Love,¬¨‚Ä†  Jason   Stephanie  #sandiegostrong

campaigns.title: COVID-19 Tipped Staff Relief
campaigns.description: Due to the rapid and wide spread of COVID-19, the state has mandated the shut down of dine-in restaurants in Philadelphia , therefore Jack‚Äö√Ñ√¥s Firehouse had to send employees home until further notice.¬¨‚Ä† Most of our staff, if not all, are full-time service industry workers and/or part time artists.¬¨‚Ä† They are suffering more now than anyone will ever know.¬¨‚Ä† As an employer not only do I fear for the future of my business but I am truly concerned for the future of my amazing staff.¬¨‚Ä† If you haven't dined in our restaurant to have the pleasure of meeting our amazing waitstaff then I will say this, they are some of the most caring, smart, patient, talented, and charismatic individuals you will ever meet.¬¨‚Ä† Not only am I proud to say they are my employees but I will say they are my family.¬¨‚Ä† Each one of them finds a way to go above and beyond for our guests, other staff, the business or our community everyday.¬¨‚Ä† Any contributions to this fund will be evenly disbursed to our staff at the end of the week to help them survive during this dark time.¬¨‚Ä† ¬¨‚Ä†Remember - every penny counts and we can‚Äö√Ñ√¥t thank you enough for your continued love and support.

E in fin dei conti a chi pu‚àö‚â§, non costa davvero nulla osare con un piccolo contributo per aiutare gli ospedali nella ricerca, nell'acquisto di altri ventilatori o altro materiale per supportare tutte le persone che cercano di combattere questo virus, chi convivendoci e chi dando una mano a chi ci convive. Non siamo in Lombardia, nel nord Italia, siamo in Campania, e come racconto dobbiamo fare in modo da sostenerci, perch‚àö¬© non abbiamo n‚àö¬© i materiali n‚àö¬© le attrezzature a sufficienza per contrastare quest'epidemia oggi giorno. Facciamo qualcosa e rendiamoci utili.

campaigns.title: Hack Covid-19 Virtual Hackathon
campaigns.description: With the Europe travel ban released this week, it is apparent Coronavirus needs to be addressed head on. We have the tools to build solutions and tackle the current issues we‚Äö√Ñ√¥re facing.  Join us for a global online hackathon - it‚Äö√Ñ√¥s imperative that we create solutions to address Coronavirus challenges and keep people as safe and healthy as possible! We‚Äö√Ñ√¥re looking to raise $20K for prizes, event production, and organizational costs. In addition, we‚Äö√Ñ√¥re looking for subject matter experts, donations of time, and appreciate support from all verticals.  Learn more here:  www.hackcovid19.com ¬¨‚Ä†  When we reach out goal, we'll be looking to bring on mentors and judges with expertise in the industry. In addition, our developer community has been brainstorming challenge areas already which include but are not limited to logistics, supply shortage management, data visualizations, symptom management apps and tools to reduce the impact of social isolation our community.  If you have a problem set recommendation, please reach out to us. If you want to get involved as a participant please fill out this form:   https://docs.google.com/forms/hackcovid19   ¬¨‚Ä†   Thank you for all of your support and encouragement. If you have any questions at all reach out to us at  hackcovid19@starfishcommunity.com .   About us:  Starfish Labs is a community of founders, developers and builders. Our San Francisco flagship location has established itself as the SF Bay Area‚Äö√Ñ√¥s leading industry hub for emerging technology, with over 40 resident companies, 15K+ visitors and over 400 events held to date. Speakers and guests have included Meltem Demirors, Vitalik Buterin, Hester Peirce, and many others.¬¨‚Ä†  Driven by our mission to accelerate industries on the fringe of adoption, we've developed an emerging tech-focused coworking hub and have partner networks in 9 cities.  Learn more about our mission at  www.starfishcommunity.com ¬¨‚Ä†

campaigns.title: Tango-Fever and Covid19
campaigns.description: As many of you already know, Hiba and I have decided to postpone our social tango events... Looking at the current situation locally and abroad, we believe this is the right thing to do. The health and wellbeing of our friends, students and Tango community, is our priority.‚Äö√Ñ¬Æ‚Äö√Ñ¬Æ  We will keep monitoring the situation closely and we truly hope that we can all return to the dance floor and to each other very soon. But the truth is this situation could go on for several more weeks, if not months.  Many of our expenses (such as hall hire for example) have been paid in advance and are not refundable (especially as the government hasn‚Äö√Ñ√¥t issued any restriction on gatherings to date). We are also challenged with ‚Äö√Ñ√≤protecting‚Äö√Ñ√¥ our future use of these venues while being self-employed with an almost total loss of income during the current ongoing situation.  Over the past few days some kind members of the community have been in touch with us to acknowledge this and to ask if we are accepting contributions towards such expenses. We have now created a Gofundme campaign, and any contributions big or small are highly appreciated.‚Äö√Ñ¬Æ‚Äö√Ñ¬Æ  We want to thank all of you for your support and patience so far, while we all are doing our part in minimising the spread of COVID-19.  Virtual Hugs,¬¨‚Ä†  Rene   Hiba¬¨‚Ä†  TANGO-FEVER Ltd  ¬¨‚Ä†

campaigns.title: Corona Nothilfefonds Deutsches Rotes Kreuz
campaigns.description: Jeder kann dazu beitragen die Corona-Pandemie einzud‚àö¬ßmmen. Um das m‚àö‚àÇglichst einfach zu erkl‚àö¬ßren, haben Christian Wolf, Len Werle und Alexander Grimme ein Tool zur Berechnung des pandemischen Fu‚àö√ºabdrucks erfunden. Die drei Stuttgarter kennen sich seit der Schulzeit.¬¨‚Ä†  Genau diesem Prinzip folgt auch auch die Berechnung des ""Pandemic Footprint"". Der ""Pandemic Footprint Index"" (kurz PFI), wird anhand der Angaben des Nutzers ermittelt. Mit einbezogen wird, wie h‚àö¬ßufig er Kontakt zu anderen Menschen hat, die Hygiene-Etikette beachtet oder in den vergangenen Wochen in einem Risikogebiet war. Am Ende kommt ein Wert zwischen 0 und 1.000 heraus, je geringer der Wert, desto besser.  Nach wenigen Tagen wurde die Website bereits ‚àö¬∫ber 100.000 Mal besucht. Wir m‚àö‚àÇchten den hohen Traffic auf unserem Index-Rechner nicht nur dazu nutzen aufzukl‚àö¬ßren, sondern pro-aktiv Menschen zu helfen, die in dieser Zeit dringend Hilfe ben‚àö‚àÇtigen.  Zusammen haben wir uns entschieden Spenden f‚àö¬∫r den Corona-Nothilfefond des Deutschen Roten Kreuzes zu sammeln. Die gesammelten Spenden sollen transparent und zu 100% beim DRK ankommen.  Die Spenden werden direkt und ‚àö¬∫ber folgende Seite an das DRK ‚àö¬∫bermittelt:  https://www.drk.de/presse/pressemitteilungen/meldung/coronavirus-drk-ruft-zu-spenden-fuer-nothilfefonds-auf/

campaigns.title: Help Passie voor dressuur door de corona heen
campaigns.description: Elke Euro telt, geen enkel bedrag is te min voor mij! Het is alleen wel zo dat je vanaf 5 Euro kan doneren, daarna krijg je een optie of je 1 of 2 euro aan fooi wil doneren voor gofundme maar je kunt ook kiezen voor ander en 0 euro invullen!   Help mijn Manege ( maar vooral de paarden ) de corona crisis door!¬¨‚Ä† Helaas komt de manege niet in aanmerking voor een uitkering, er mogen geen groepslessen/ priv‚àö¬© lessen meer gegeven worden. Maar natuurlijk gaat de zorg, de huur en de voeding kosten voor de paarden gewoon door! Om de geweldige eigenaresse niet in de kou te laten staan wil ik haar helpen door een donatie binnen te halen zodat zij door kan gaan en geen paarden hierdoor hoeft te verkopen / hoeven te leiden. Want dood laten gaan zal zij never ever toestaan!¬¨‚Ä†En aangezien zij altijd!! maar dan ook altijd de zielige / slecht verzorgde paarden in huis neemt hebben de paarden uw steun echt hard nodig!  Helpt u mij mee?¬¨‚Ä†  Het ergste wat er kan gebeuren als we niks binnen halen dat ze paarden al moeten gaan verkopen :( Het geld zal voornamelijk gebruikt worden om voer en stal onderhoud te kunnen behouden. en de verzorging voor de paarden. het geld is zsm nodig aangezien niemand weet hoe het zal lopen met de crisis. de paarden betekenen voor mij heel erg veel, ik kan er ontspannen en weer iets genieten van de wereld en mijn leven. zonder paardrijden weet ik niet of ik nog verder kom in het leven. Door het corona virus ben ik aardig in de put geraakt. ( en opstapeling van ellendige gebeurtenissen de afgelopen tijd... )  ik kan niet in woorden uitdrukken hoeveel het voor mij zou betekenen als u ook maar 1 euro overmaakt!   samen staan we sterk!

campaigns.title: Support HRM Community Members During COVID-19
campaigns.description: Help us provide a helping hand to those whose financial security has been significantly impacted by COVID-19.¬¨‚Ä†   COVID-19 is rapidly changing our social and financial landscape in Halifax, the impacts of which are being disproportionately felt by those who were already living on the edge of financial insecurity.  Employees are being told to stay home as events are cancelled, services suspended, schools closed. Those working in service industries remain vulnerable, but are now dealing with more limited patronage as Haligonians begin to socially isolate.  Many among us have already been struggling, and are now facing unprecedented financial challenges with limited opportunities to earn additional wages.  However, some of us are better positioned to cope with COVID-19. Some of us are financially secure. More than that, some of us have more than we need, want to help others who are less financially secure, and are looking for a forum to do so.  And so, Helping Hand HRM. The idea is simple - those who are financially able, consider donating to this Go Fund Me. All funds will go to those whose financial security has been significantly impacted by COVID-19 to fulfill their short-term financial needs indicated through our Instagram account.  Those in need should  DM the Helping Hand HRM Instagram account ¬¨‚Ä†and let us know what you need. Money for rent? Groceries? A hydro bill? Indicate the amount, and we will use the funds donated to this Go Fund Me to help to the best of our abilities.   Funds will be distributed on a needs basis. That is to say, we will try and meet the financial need indicated by each person, rather than distributing funds equally to everyone who reaches out.  Any funds donated greater than the needs of community members will be donated to local food banks.  Thank you for reading - please share widely!  Follow us on Instagram at  Helping Hand HRM
